title: Wildfire
body:
***DeFi***

* [Aave Discussion](https://governance.aave.com/t/arc-increase-the-usdt-debt-ceiling-for-the-avalanche-v3-market/8871); ARC: Raise the Avalanche V3 Market's USDT debt ceiling 
  * The debt ceiling for USDT was set at $5 million when the Avalanche V3 market first opened. The goal of this proposal is to raise the USDT debt ceiling on the Avalanche V3 Market to $75 million. 
  * Borrowing against USDT on the Avalanche V3 Market is no longer an option because the current debt ceiling has been reached. Over $650M worth of USDT is currently available on Avalanche. If the limit were raised to $75M, nearly 20% of the available USDT on Aave would be accepted as collateral in isolation mode. 
  * According to the author, despite the controversies surrounding USDT, stablecoin continues to have the longest history of any significant stablecoin and the greatest market cap. 
* [Aave Discussion](https://governance.aave.com/t/arc-add-woo-as-a-collateral-borrow-asset/8927); WOO Network AAVE asset listing proposal
  * WOO Network is a deep liquidity network that links traders, Zero-fee trading on WOO X is made possible by staking WOO. Large institutional traders, exchanges, and investors hence need a lot of capital to get the required WOO. These players might borrow the necessary WOO if they were listed on AAVE without having to expose themselves to market turbulence. 
  * Additionally, more than 50% of the WOO in circulation is being staked, indicating WOO holders are looking for yield opportunities and are therefore more likely to engage in lending. They may also use WOO as a collateral asset to gain market exposure without selling their WOO via the AAVE application. These elements collectively suggest potential TVL expansion for AAVE.
* [Aave Proposal](https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x296983800a2f7bd6227dda45a106e40e759a75e1c908456af4c2f6d6f668c540); Aave Governance. Adjust Level 2 requirements (long executor)
  * This proposal is for the Aave community's approval to modify the governance standards (proposition power, quorum vote differential) for Level 2 ideas, which will have an impact on the most important parts of the Aave ecosystem.
  * From the perspective of the BGD, this is strongly advised because those requirements were established in the past when the AAVE fragmentation was different, and because it could result in the creation of an artificial and self-imposed bottleneck to pass proposals that, given their technical nature, shouldn't really face opposition.
  * A more detailed explanation of this proposal is contained in this [forum post](https://governance.aave.com/t/rfc-aave-governance-adjust-level-2-requirements-long-executor/8693).

***Public Goods***

* [ENS Tempcheck;](https://discuss.ens.domains/t/reimbursing-onchain-voters/13660) Reimburisng Onchain Voters.
  * This temp check brings up the point that the total spent on gas for the last nine airdrops has been 3.75 ETH
  * Most of this gas is spent through delegates but reimbursing gas costs could encourage smaller voters to vote
  * At best this can be used on a trial basis and see how it affects voter outcomes 
* [Gitcoin Proposal;](https://snapshot.org/#/gitcoindao.eth/proposal/0xc6309348f43ba77bb488d2d5f154db3264f86a890b500fa8286fe089c6ddc9a0) Collective Workstream & Budget Request for Season 15
  * This is a proposal for Season 15 budgets that amounts to $1,445,514
  * The breakdown of the budget:
    * Contributor Compensation - $635,911
    * Hiring Budget - $232,500
    * Dev Rel Expenses - $60,000
    * OpEx - $55.018
    * 60 day reserves - $462,085

title: Otherdeed Metadata Provenance Information
body:
## Otherdeed Metadata Provenance Information

We are pleased to share the complete Otherdeed metadata and provenance information. In the time since the provenance hash for Otherdeed NFT collection [was first written to the contract](https://etherscan.io/tx/0xe3af78b358819e12ab1bee608e7e480e7897df3003b2afe754e8619f4205b113), three corrections have been made to the collection metadata, necessitating an update of the original hash on-chain. A summary of the corrections and instructions on how to compute the Otherdeed collection provenance on your own are below.

## Summary of Metadata Corrections

1. Due to a bug in the script used to generate the collection metadata, the `Rugged Pickaxe` artifact was incorrectly omitted from the metadata for Otherdeed NFTs that correctly depicted the artifact in the NFT image. This was updated shortly after the reveal.
2. The `Stone Hole Jackson` Koda body type from the original Otherdeed collection metadata has been updated to `Stone Holes`. This was missed by the several rounds of audits by sensitivity readers.
3. Due to developer oversight, a typo was included in the`Octo Tentaclenotinfinalcollection` Koda attribute, it is now `Octo Tentacle`

## Verifying the Otherdeed Collection Provenance

The raw Otherdeed collection metadata as well as a Ruby script to reproduce the provenance hash are available [in this open source GitHub Repository](https://github.com/yuga-labs/land_provenance).

title: Exploring governance for better futures
body:
**SuperBenefit DAO is convening a short series of Twitter Spaces** to explore how the nature of governance is evolving, and to inquire into the governance we need to accelerate the arrival of better futures. We call this project *[Exploring governance for better futures](http://exploregov.xyz/)*.

We are specifically interested in how Web3 technologies are enabling new models of governance towards these ends, and their potential to combine with existing practices, perspectives, and wisdom.

Beyond the governance of organisations, communities, and networks, we’ll probe the notion of meta-governance and the practicalities of governance in a systems context.

## Three conversations

Over three conversations, we engaged with people who bring different and complementary perspectives to governance. This included experience and views from DAOs, other decentralised networks, the co-operative movement, Indigenous cultures, purpose-led business, and civic and systems innovation.

We explored perspectives on the essential functions and attributes of governance, and the design implications for governance arrangements that seek to foster decentralisation, pluralism, and regeneration.

Each of the conversations were framed around a question (click the links to listen to a recording of the conversation):

1. **June 2, 2022:** [Metagovernance - what is it and what’s its potential?](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/bb5052a5-016e-4c6b-89c0-c69c3ccbad7e/space_1_edit.m4a?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAT73L2G45EIPT3X45%2F20220719%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20220719T231613Z&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Signature=77fe18b11f891a837d39417f2fdec6a3cc766398db43801fe7c33d196630f6a0&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&response-content-disposition=filename%20%3D%22Twitter%2520Space%25201.m4a%22&x-id=GetObject)
2. **June 16, 2022:** [DAO to DAO - what are we seeing and learning from inter-DAO cooperation?](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/67dc585f-fb81-4fa8-86c8-facb8fd3baa3/space_2_edit.m4a?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAT73L2G45EIPT3X45%2F20220719%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20220719T231713Z&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Signature=ed177fa56d512455c09b9ff001f20ff25460b76cf62b45340fbff19d4ab37256&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&response-content-disposition=filename%20%3D%22Twitter%2520Space%25202.m4a%22&x-id=GetObject)
3. **June 30, 2022:** [New and old - what can Web3 learn from and contribute to existing governance perspectives and practices?](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/f24d6415-3808-44bb-9255-03cfbac51ed9/space_3_edit.m4a?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAT73L2G45EIPT3X45%2F20220719%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20220719T231714Z&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Signature=5217a53f2eec2af45dd1281218778593b4c48c4e7b14015ed2b8a949584427d3&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&response-content-disposition=filename%20%3D%22Twitter%2520Space%25203.m4a%22&x-id=GetObject)

All Twitter Spaces took place from 6:30 to 7:30 pm EST and were hosted on the [SuperBenefit Twitter account.](https://twitter.com/superbenefitdao)

* To share this page easily, you can use the link [exploregov.xyz](http://exploregov.xyz/)

## Conversation 1: Metagovernance - what is it and what’s its potential?

Taking place from 6:30 to 7:30 pm EST on Thursday, June 2, **the first Twitter Space in this series** featured:

* **[Bryan Petes](https://twitter.com/BryanPetes)** – Cofounder [@TeamSobol](https://twitter.com/TeamSobol) | Also playing the DAO game w/ [@banklessDAO](https://twitter.com/banklessDAO), [@CityDAO](https://twitter.com/CityDAO), [@DAOPunksNFT](https://twitter.com/DAOPunksNFT), [@PolygonDAO](https://twitter.com/PolygonDAO), [@ReputableDAO](https://twitter.com/ReputableDAO) in my spare cycles.
* **[Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth)** – on-chain sleuth: [@InfoTokenDAO](https://twitter.com/InfoTokenDAO)
* **[justinehy.eth](https://twitter.com/lalalavendr)** – head of dao strategy, bd, & metagovernance at [@rabbithole_gg](https://twitter.com/rabbithole_gg) - [justine.mirror.xyz](https://t.co/8jcuIPBPEj)
* **[Rowan Yeoman](https://twitter.com/yeoro)** – centerless network gravity | [@SuperBenefitDAO](https://twitter.com/SuperBenefitDAO), [@AkinaFoundation](https://twitter.com/AkinaFoundation) – [socialleancanvas.com](https://t.co/JNON2dLI2L)

Read **[key insights and takeaways](https://superbenefit.mirror.xyz/yyY2khsoDSgCBaLSIJMeT6xNPJ0c9d2T83rYyt6UfX8)** from the June 2 Twitter Space or **[click here to listen to a recording](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/bb5052a5-016e-4c6b-89c0-c69c3ccbad7e/space_1_edit.m4a?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAT73L2G45EIPT3X45%2F20220719%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20220719T231613Z&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Signature=77fe18b11f891a837d39417f2fdec6a3cc766398db43801fe7c33d196630f6a0&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&response-content-disposition=filename%20%3D%22Twitter%2520Space%25201.m4a%22&x-id=GetObject)** of the June 2 Twitter Space.

## Conversation 2: DAO to DAO - what are we seeing and learning from inter-DAO cooperation?

Taking place from 6:30 to 7:30 pm EST on Thursday, June 16, **the second Twitter Space in this series** featured:

* **[Chase Chapman](https://twitter.com/chaserchapman)** - building a better society with web3 contributing [@OrcaProtocol](https://twitter.com/OrcaProtocol) [@indexcoop](https://twitter.com/indexcoop) // investing @ cowfund // cofounder (now advisor) [@decentology](https://twitter.com/decentology) // [Otherside podcast](https://www.othersidepod.xyz/)
* **[Stefen Deleveaux](https://twitter.com/stefdelev)** – President, Caribbean Blockchain Alliance ([@cbahub](https://twitter.com/cbahub)); DAOist [@thedaoist_](https://twitter.com/thedaoist_) [@primedao_](https://twitter.com/primedao_) [@govrnhq](https://twitter.com/govrnhq); resident dao ecologist
* **[Jihad](https://twitter.com/jaesmail)** – building [@forefront__](https://twitter.com/forefront__) / squad [@otherinternet__](https://twitter.com/otherinternet__) / prev [@syndicatedao](https://twitter.com/syndicatedao) [@amagrowth](https://twitter.com/amagrowth) / 🇵🇸
* **[Michael Lewkowitz](https://twitter.com/Lewwwk)** – transition + cooperation | invest [@possibilianVC](https://twitter.com/possibilianVC), source [@SuperBenefitDAO](https://twitter.com/SuperBenefitDAO), stew [@KrauseHouseDAO](https://twitter.com/KrauseHouseDAO)
* **[Rowan Yeoman](https://twitter.com/yeoro)** – centerless network gravity | [@SuperBenefitDAO](https://twitter.com/SuperBenefitDAO), [@AkinaFoundation](https://twitter.com/AkinaFoundation) – [socialleancanvas.com](https://t.co/JNON2dLI2L)

Read **[key insights and takeaways](https://superbenefit.mirror.xyz/ReJ2QiTJh34veQvwLHZJJdMIFDF8Ri9SM6A3dcXRuKk)** from the June 16 Twitter Space or **[click here to listen to a recording](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/67dc585f-fb81-4fa8-86c8-facb8fd3baa3/space_2_edit.m4a?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAT73L2G45EIPT3X45%2F20220719%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20220719T231713Z&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Signature=ed177fa56d512455c09b9ff001f20ff25460b76cf62b45340fbff19d4ab37256&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&response-content-disposition=filename%20%3D%22Twitter%2520Space%25202.m4a%22&x-id=GetObject)** of the June 16 Twitter Space.

## Conversation 3: New and old - what can Web3 learn from and contribute to existing governance perspectives and practices?

Taking place from 6:30 to 7:30 pm EST on Thursday, June 30, **the third Twitter Space in this series** featured:

* **[Jayne Engle](https://twitter.com/JayneEngle)** - Civic Futures | strategist/urbanist/builder/seeker | adj professor urbanism [@mcgillu](https://twitter.com/mcgillu) | [#SacredCivics](https://twitter.com/search?q=%23SacredCivics&src=hashtag_click): Building [Seven Generation Cities](http://bit.ly/7GenCities)
* **Tina Jennen** - Tina is involved with the [Wellbeing Protocol](https://www.thewellbeingprotocol.org) ([see video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RXRkLfAEaK0)) and, with a diverse range of governance experience, has insights into how governance and design approaches can foster community and civic self-determination
* **[Alex Hannant](https://twitter.com/AlexHannant)** - For better and fairer. [@AlexHannant](https://twitter.com/AlexHannant) [@SuperBenefitDAO](https://twitter.com/SuperBenefitDAO) [@YunusGriffith](https://twitter.com/YunusGriffith) [@BCorpANZ](https://twitter.com/BCorpANZ)

**[Click here to listen to a recording](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/f24d6415-3808-44bb-9255-03cfbac51ed9/space_3_edit.m4a?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAT73L2G45EIPT3X45%2F20220719%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20220719T231714Z&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Signature=5217a53f2eec2af45dd1281218778593b4c48c4e7b14015ed2b8a949584427d3&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&response-content-disposition=filename%20%3D%22Twitter%2520Space%25203.m4a%22&x-id=GetObject)** of the June 30 Twitter Space.

## Hosting and learning

The conversations were be hosted by SuperBenefit, who are currently undertaking research in Web3 governance principles, practices, and patterns.

Our intention is to harvest the learnings from across the three spaces and integrate them with independent research into governance models and practice in order to publish an article with our findings and to inform further conversations and explorations.

We welcome collaborators! If you’re interested in joining us in this project, reach out to [Heenal](https://twitter.com/heenalr) or [Michelle](https://twitter.com/ml_baldwin) on Twitter, or [join SuperBenefit’s Discord](https://discord.gg/QFW7Wc7cgS).

title: 3 Blockers to Mainstream Web3 (2022)
body:
Someone asked me today, **“What do you think are the blockers to mainstream web3 for the next cycle?”** I thought I’d share what I see as blockers to mainstream adoption, which mostly have to do with L2 and wallets. 

1. Products need to move onto L2 networks
2. Exchanges need to provide cheap on-ramps directly to L2
3. Products and specifically wallets need to abstract L2 networks.

I’ve written this out here and also experimented with sharing in video format. Let me know if the video format is helpful.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qne3pxTqHRI](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qne3pxTqHRI)

# Products and projects need to move or start on L2 networks

The thing that killed each cycle was that Ethereum L1 didn’t scale and became expensive to use. This was very clear in the “DeFi summer” of 2020, and the NFT explosion in 2021. Transaction fees became too expensive and it priced people out. Eventually, only whales could afford to make profitable trades in DeFi, and only large speculators would mint Yuga Labs NFTs in 2021.

# Exchanges need to provide cheap on-ramps directly to L2 (for a few cents)

We shouldn’t expect users to buy ETH and bridge to L2. Users need to purchase L2 tokens directly from exchanges with fiat, and then send them cheaply into the L2 networks so that they can use those products. We should look at apps like Coinbase to help onboard users to L2. 

# Products and specifically wallets need to abstract L2 networks

It doesn’t matter whether someone uses MasterCard or Visa these days. All of the payment processors can handle either and they abstract the differences. The same thing needs to happen with L2 networks, and it’s likely the wallets the need to take on this task.

Different products will launch on different L2s. It’ll be messy if we expect users to navigate all of the different L2s, and so wallets (Coinbase Wallet, Rainbow, Argent, etc) need to abstract the L2s and provide ways to bridge between them seamlessly. The user shouldn’t need to care that they have Arbitrum ETH tokens but want to use Mirror, which is on Optimism.

title: Zk.money - incognito Defi & alternatywa dla tornadocash z potencjałem na dropa?
body:
## zk.money - prywatna warstwa dla Web 3.0 na silniku Aztec.Network - kilka słów o technologii.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2K-1MxaAX1hUd0dQuMUUs.png?height=607&width=1694)

Dziś Popuś napisze Wam kilka słów o technologii, która jest bliska moim poglądom.  
 Tak tak, fuck-the-system , JP, HWDP na 100%! I tak rozumcie zk.money bo coś w tym jest. 😜

 
 Od razu napiszę, że nie mam się za jakiegoś GURU. Napiszę to co wiem, a wiem pewnie troszkę więcej niż ty ziom. Postaram się pisać językiem abyś mnie zrozumiał.  
 Jest to też potencjalna spekulacja. Większość osób ma oczy skierowane w kierunku **#StarkNet**. Ja zwykle stoję z boku i obserwuję podobne protokoły, które mają mniejszy socialhype i fajnie się rozwijają. Dlatego dziś będzie o zk.money a nie o StarkNet.

## zk.money - warstwa 2 na ETH skupiona na prywatności 👀

[zk.money](https://twitter.com/aztecnetwork) to dApps do ochrony prywatności w warstwie 2 umożliwiająca użytkownikom prywatne przesyłanie **$ETH, $DAI & $renBTC** ( renBTC *był w v1 ale v2 obecnie off - wróci, spokojnie*). Zk.Money jest zbudowane na silniku [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) (*Zk-Rollup na Eth)*.  
 Aztec jest porównywalny do [zkSync](https://medium.com/@CalendarDefi/airdrop-guide-zksync-zigzag-a83ef3b33b70), ale koncentruje się na prywatności, której w #zkSync brak imo.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XME4s721Yez0zhziC8YLK.png?height=891&width=2545)

**Podam prosty przykład anonimowej wysyłki $ETH :**

* **Deponujesz** *(shield) *$ETH **lub** $DAI z mainetu na **zk-money L2 
 **
* Znając **alias *(login)*** drugiej osoby wysyłasz jej $ETH lub $Dai po L2 (sobie, delerowi, whatever). Koszt transakcji bardzo niski (L2). Dzięki technologi **zero-knowledge proof** druga strona otrzyma ETH, ale nie będzie wiadomo od kogo. Co ciekawsze ty jako wysyłający masz dostęp do potwierdzenia, że transakcja pochodzi od Ciebie (gdyby zaszła taka potrzeba to, to potwierdzisz).  
 **Nikt inny nie ma do tego dostępu bez twojego walletu!**  
 
* Gdy zamiast aliasu odbiorcy podasz adres ethereum środki zostaną wysłane na mainet. I ten przykład w moim przypadku ma utility w kwestiach spekulacji & sybilu na multiwalletach. Rozumiesz schemat prawda? Ahhh, jak ja dużo Ci mówię…🤫

## Dobra spekulancie, wiem co interesuje Cię najbardziej… Co ja tam mam robić niby, co?🤫

[Zk.Money](https://zk.money/) i sieć [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) działają już na mainecie. Ani jedno, ani drugie nie ma jeszcze tokena. Czy będzie ? Czas pokaże. Ja obserwuje i klikam bo jara mnie ta technologia. Uważam, że *Satoshi Nakamoto* byłby dumny z tego co tu się odpierdala. Jak ktoś podchodzi do tematu czysto spekulacyjnie to uważam, że jest teraz na to dobry czas. Dlaczego? Niedawno przeszli na mainet. Ruski gas od Vitalika, też nie taki straszny, jak straszą nas w mediach głównego ścieku 🤮

### Dobra - napiszę, co tam do przeklikania

Na początek musisz wejść na [zk.money](https://zk.money/signup) połączyć portfel (np. Metamask) i stworzyć swój alias 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2WIEKnA3MGihB0EOc2p8B.png?height=993&width=1635)

Następnie podpisać kilka transakcji i go zarejestrować, po czym zdeponować minimum **0.01 ETH** w celu aktywacji konta.  
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MB-G30l7eZtNDojkifd3f.png?height=2151&width=3117)

**Włalaaaa - Done!** Masz już swój alias i interakcje z kontraktem.  
  
 **UWAGA!** Zapisz swój alias bo gdy go utracisz -- utracisz swoje środki.  
 W zkmoney **.v1** gdy nie pamiętaliśmy swojego aliasu można było wygenerować nowy. W **.v2** jest to niemożliwe! 
  
 Warto pójść o krok dalej i popatrzyć co protokół ma nam do zaoferowania. 
 Zk.Money V1 oferowało nam jedynie przesyłanie ETH, DAI i renBTC pomiędzy walletami L2 & Mainet. Team postanowił pójść o krok dalej. Obecnie rozwijają private-defi aby na warstwie drugiej poza zwykłym ‘anonimowym’ przesyłaniem wartości dostępne były swapy, stakinngi i inne bajery, które znamy z DEFI. Zaczeli z [LIDO](https://lido.fi/) (staking ETH dla ETH 2.0) - obecnie 4,38% APY. Druga opcja, która już jest wdrożona to staking DAI w współpracy z [ElementFi](https://www.element.fi/) . Znaleść to możemy w zakładce [EARN](https://zk.money/earn). Warto to przeklikać i wrzucić coś ETH do LIDO czy troche DAI do ElementFi na staking. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rS8YpDbaq0A3Kk8agtL7f.png?height=1188&width=2513)

## 👇 Kolejne protokoły soooon ser 👇

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i7DBEBz3n4o8U91Qs04DG.png?height=810&width=2494)

## Co jeszcze warto zrobić?

* Warto przerzucić assety z L2 na Mainet. Aby to zrobić przy wysyłce zamiast aliasu należy wkleić adres ETH *\[0x…\] 
 *
* Warto też przesłać asset po sieci L2. Aby to zrobić należy wkleić nie adres ETH, a alias odbiorcy. Możesz ‘posypać’ Popusiowi. Ahhh. Nie wypada tak mówić. Anyway, jak podoba Ci się, to co robie i tak bardzo chcesz - mój login masz na screenach wyżej. 
 
* Jeśli interesuje Cię więcej, warto dołączyć na [Discord](https://discord.gg/DePA3Uvd)

### UWAGA!

> Co do oficjalnej informacji o *#airdrop*.  Team nic takiego nie potwierdził.  
 Nie potwierdzili też tego, że kiedykolwiek powstanie token. Dodam, że większość potwierdzonych dropów wychodziła słabo. Zgodzisz się ze mną? 
 *“…Cicha woda brzegi rwie!”*  

Na koniec jeszcze jedna uwaga. Jeśli obserwujesz mnie dłużej to pewnie o zk.money już wiesz i bawiłeś się tam już na v1. Jeśli tak to zaloguj się na [old.zk.money](https://old.zk.money/) i przenieś swoje assety na L1 po czym dokonaj ponownej migracji na L2 tworząc nowy alias. Tak mi doradzono na discordzie i tak zrobiłem. 

Temat będę obserwował dalej. Jeśli Cię to zainteresowało zapraszam do mnie na telegram i twitter aby być na bieżąco.

* [Twitter Popek1990.eth](https://twitter.com/popek1990crypto)
* [Telegram Popek1990.ETH \[Ogłoszenia\]](https://t.me/popek1990crypto)

```
Dyskusje w komentarzach na twitter ✌️
```

title:
DAOTOOL#101 #1:
Aragon to Create and manage DAOs.
body:
## What is Aragon?

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0KQ5HbNdz6ZVn2yC3PyM8.png?height=1813&width=2654)

Aragon is a decentralized app (dApp) on the Ethereum blockchain that allows **anyone** to create and manage a decentralized organization with a suite of **applications and services**. Aragon was born out of the emergent societal crisis, and failure of democracy. It was founded in 2016 by internet entrepreneurs Luis Cuende and Jorge Izquierdo. The project is open source and led by the Aragon Foundation. Projects using Aragon include [Decentraland](https://decentraland.org/), [BrightID](https://www.brightid.org/) and [Badger](https://badger.com/).

Some of the other DAOs powered by Aragon:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mTIHosxCobVCqOp1vYfD0.png?height=981&width=1920)

### Importance of Aragon:

Creating and managing a DAO is challenging even for experienced blockchain devs. There are so many things to account for right - Coding, Decision making, establishing a dispute resolution strategy, for day-to-day activities and voting etc etc  That's where Aragon comes in with its products and services which provide the tools you need to get started quickly and easily. They have templates to set up DAOs, They also offer governance methods, dispute resolution methods and so on!

## Products and Services:

1. **Aragon** **Client**

   To create your own organization in a few minutes with different types of templates.
2. **Aragon Voice(In alpha)**

   For creating, managing and voting on proposals in a way that is secure, gas less, permissionless and decentralized.
3. **Aragon Court**

   For decentralized dispute resolution that cannot be resolved by smart contracts alone.
4. **Aragon Govern(In alpha)**

    To continually execute actions with frictionless self-governing contracts unless they are challenged.

### 1. What is Aragon Client?

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/diS6qoWTlFH626GuXvDo1.png?height=396&width=800)

The Aragon client is a widely used Aragon product which is perfect for beginners who want to create a new DAO because of their templates feature. Since it's been launched in 2019, the number of DAOs it contains has skyrocketed and has become the dominant solution on the market. You can check out some of those DAOs [here](https://poweredby.aragon.org/).

[How to create a DAO using Aragon client?](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-client/how-to-create-a-dao-using-aragon-client)

**What are templates?**
Templates are pre-configured smart contracts which you can use to create different types of organizations or to create your own on top of it.

* ​[Company​ template](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-client/how-to-create-a-dao-using-aragon-client/use-company-template)
  It's an organization where **transferable tokens** are used to represent stake in the organization. The decisions are made by a voting mechanism, where **each token is equivalent to one vote.**
* ​[Membership​ template](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-client/how-to-create-a-dao-using-aragon-client/use-membership-template)
  It's an organization where **non-transferable tokens** are used to represent stake in the organization. The decisions are made by a voting mechanism where **one-member have one-vote.**
* [​Reputation​ template](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-client/how-to-create-a-dao-using-aragon-client/page-1)
  It's an organization where **non-transferable tokens** are used to represent reputation in the organization. Decisions are made using **reputation-weighted voting.**

> If you can't seem to find what you need in the default templates, you can set up a custom [development environment](https://hack.aragon.org/docs/getting-started#environment-setup) and use the [aragonCLI](https://hack.aragon.org/docs/cli-intro) in order to [create a custom Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO).](https://hack.aragon.org/docs/guides-custom-deploy)

### 2. What is Aragon Voice(In alpha)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ajt3UgpkTbfF8HCfC_nb7.png?height=580&width=1172)

Aragon voice is a new and revolutionary way of voting that doesn’t require gas fees and permission. With Aragon Voice, it is possible to submit proposals with any standard ERC20 token and to vote on proposals using an entirely decentralized and verifiable ballot protocol. Top tokens using Aragon voice include UNI, MATIC, COMP, and ANT.

It provides smart security and transparency measures to protect the integrity of the voting process on all levels. Open source, end-to-end verifiability, and trustless voting utilizing Ethereum main network along with Aragon Layer 2 protocol. It is securely recorded digitally, verified accurately, and safely accessible for public verification.

[How to create a voting proposals?](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-voice/creating-a-voting-proposal)

[How to create a voting proposal using your token?](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-voice/how-to-create-a-proposal)

[How to vote on a proposal?](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-voice/voting-on-a-proposal)

### 3. What is Aragon Court

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1arggVN3JJeYclKeXDIGz.jpg?height=520&width=1248)

Aragon Court is another great opensource contribution by Aragon. It's a dispute resolution protocol that allows for subjective problems to be solved when a smart contract can't resolve the matter at hand. This is achieved by having a set of guardians drafted for each situation randomly who will then cast their votes and guarantee the correct ruling for an earning. It is accessible by API to any decentralized application (dApp) but fully implemented in the Aragon OpenStack. They have an active 516,000 ANT($1,049,262) staked and an 94 active Guardians.

[How to use Aragon court?](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-court/court-dashboard)

[How does Aragon Court works?](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-court/dispute-lifecycle)

[how to act as a guardian?](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-court/acting-as-guardian-for-an-aragon-govern-dispute)

### 4.What is Aragon Govern(In alpha)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZUyubpq0bUaUaMXppsAJ_.png?height=580&width=1172)

Aragon Govern is a new framework for governing DAOs based on the principles of Optimistic Governance with a decentralized dispute resolution mechanism and on-chain execution which utilizes both Aragon voice and Aragon court.

Aragon Govern lets your communities operate using DAO consensus. This is an unconventional form of governance which opts to execute all project procedures as normal unless a challenge has been made by resident members via the Aragon Court, a special block on the ledger reserved for administrative decisions with subjective implications.

[How to create a Govern DAO?](https://documentation.aragon.org/products/aragon-govern/how-do-i-create-an-aragon-govern-dao)

### Summary

The statistics itself shows the trust and reliability Aragon provides for DAOs, with **$190 million** in treasury, **1900 DApps** built with Aragon, over **$500 million in total value locked**, and **60,000+ members** in Aragon powered DAOs Aragon is the go-to place to create and manage DAOs.

Useful links:

Official website         - <https://aragon.org/>
User documentation - <https://documentation.aragon.org/aragon/readme>                     Blog                            - <https://blog.aragon.org/>                                                               Forum                         - <https://forum.aragon.org/>

title:
DAOTOOL#101#2: 
Mirror - A Toolkit to Support the Sharing and Funding of Anything from Anywhere.
body:
## What is Mirror?

Mirror is an “essential Web3 toolkit for sharing and funding anything”, a Web 3.0 publishing platform that offers a suite of tools that empower anyone by bringing them one step closer to achieving the full potential of their content. It is also Ethereum's first great alternative to the mainstream publishing platforms like Medium and WordPress.

**Some of their highlights:**

[https://krausehouse.mirror.xyz/crowdfunds/0x9F6F91078A5072A8B54695DAfA2374Ab3cCd603b](https://krausehouse.mirror.xyz/crowdfunds/0x9F6F91078A5072A8B54695DAfA2374Ab3cCd603b)

[https://ens.mirror.xyz/-eaqMv7XPikvXhvjbjzzPNLS4wzcQ8vdOgi9eNXeUuY](https://ens.mirror.xyz/-eaqMv7XPikvXhvjbjzzPNLS4wzcQ8vdOgi9eNXeUuY)

[https://kitteh.mirror.xyz/editions/0x3725CA6034bcDBc3c9aDa649d49Df68527661175/40](https://kitteh.mirror.xyz/editions/0x3725CA6034bcDBc3c9aDa649d49Df68527661175/40)

## Importance of Mirror

Now anyone could put out anything that they've published as NFTs, enabling their biggest fans to support them and become early investors in their work. Readers could send tips and receive tokens as a reward for supporting their favorite writers which results in building a vibrant community and Mirror provides smart contracts for crowd-funding a new initiative directly from the writings.

All this by completely circumventing advertisers who constantly interrupt your reading flow by getting in your face with messaging hints at every visit!

[https://twitter.com/Cooopahtroopa/status/1449909594516455426](https://twitter.com/Cooopahtroopa/status/1449909594516455426)

## How do Mirror Works?

Mirror uses Arweave to permanently store users' content. The average cost of storing data on the decentralized storage protocol currently is $0.01 per gigabyte, which Mirror takes care of for its users. In doing so, they are able to offer free publishing services. Additionally, unlike traditional online platforms that require strenuous login processes and accounts, Mirror uses

"Sign in with Ethereum" method for authentication. It makes independent verification possible through non-Ethereum keypair that signs the posts and are stored in Arweave which then is paired with writers Ethereum address. Nobody has to disclose any private information, no need to sign up for an email account and no need for creation of a new password.

## Key Features

* **Mirror Editor**

This text editor and publisher lets users build posts with media blocks. eg: Images, crypto economic blocks, and embedded auctions.

[https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/editor](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/editor)

* **Crowd Funding**

Mirror lets users crowdfund a project, i.e. an Ethereum smart contract for raising funds, via its text and media blocks - like videos. Contributors receive a token(ERC20) that represents their participation and ownership in the project.

[https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/crowdfunds](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/crowdfunds)

* **Splits**

Split is an ERC20-compliant smart contract-based payments routing mechanism that lets creators allocate funds from auctions or donations to “collaborators, the people that have inspired you, or to donate proceeds from your work.”

[https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/splits](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/splits)

* **Entry NFTs**

Posts on Mirror can be minted as 1/1 non-fungible tokens. This means that they are collectors items that anyone who wants a souvenir of this moment in time or just an avid fan can help the creator get some financial backing for the creation of future projects!

[https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/mint-writing-nfts](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/mint-writing-nfts)

* **Edition**

A functionality for creating a limited supply of identical NFTs at a fixed price, e.g. 100 pieces of crypto-art. This new feature will bring about an exciting new implementation for non-fungible items and will allow users to create fixed editions, as well as trade and identify digital art through various methods on the blockchain with ease.

[https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/editions](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/editions)

* **Entry Editions**

Creators can use this tokenization system to mint their Mirror posts as limited-edition NFTs instead of 1/1s.

* **Tokens**

A decentralized frontend for easy ERC20 token minting and distribution of governance token to build vibrant communities.

[https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/tokens](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/guide/tokens)

## How to create a Crowdfund?

1\. Head over to mirror.xyz and connect your wallet.

![Click on "Connect Wallet"](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZWfqa6R0Bj8m5Bfdmg9Bx.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

![Select your wallet, choose your account & connect.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aC0QcIKKm23ARkrCZbcEi.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

2\. Go to Dashboard.

![Click on " Visit Dashboard "](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QlEeULcKjPBnYVHClBh9a.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

3\. To skip every interaction allow remembering you.

![Click on "Remember me" and click on "Sign" button.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UGdGKoRUnkGfOlyy4Ka3J.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

4\. To setup crowdfund select Crowdfund and click on “Create Your First Crowdfund”.

![Click on "Create Your First Crowdfund" button.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2wv2QNSUy8fuHJxgOXNTp.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

5\. Fill out ‘Basics’, “Goal and funds”, “Token”, “Story” & “Go live” . `Required`

![Select each of them and fill out the required details. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DQX6hLoXAlDR11Yjk6XlX.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bb4VwDSVETO8Dwa7FeDnX.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

5\. Fill out the required details(Basics).

![Give a title, image and save it.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/gwRB-aimBEbg8bVXNrSIp.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

6\. Fill out the required details(Goal and funds).

![Set the amount.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M4fFjO-ujtVakDa2Tlwoa.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

7\. In Funds recipient section fill the wallet address to receive funds.

![After filling out the details click on "Save and Continue"](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TFigCQw0DBHyrPxcDrin1.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

8\.  Fill out the required details(Token).

![Fill out the form as you see fit and save it](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yJI_cuH8qSq00HbThBNvO.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

9\. Fill out the required details(Story).

![Describe your crowdfund, Add Story Content and save it.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tJvHjHe__0ks4wv2BGXzT.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

10\. Verify the filled out required details(Go live).

![Edit if required or mark it correct.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/STiQ78glL5tmGbEQsX04n.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

![Edit if required or mark it correct and click on Deploy Crowdfund.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1Ke0Yfq59IsW5EzFBLpDr.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

11\. `Confirm` the transaction and your crowdfund is live!

![Confirm the transaction.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/R0ARSO3sWCCSwJBh19wuC.png?height=1020&width=1920&size=medium)

The Crowdfund will be live after the confirmation!!

### Summary

Mirror is a tool owned and controlled by the users that’s helping users to express their own content in the way they see fit without limitation and additional tools even for beginners with templates to do from minting of NFTs to Crowdfunding a cause or idea which represents the coming age of decentralized networks and blockchain technology as a whole. 

**Useful links**

[https://mirror.xyz/](https://mirror.xyz/)

[https://dev.mirror.xyz/](https://dev.mirror.xyz/)

[https://t.me/mirror_curator_dao](https://t.me/mirror_curator_dao)

title: ArborDAO Whitepaper
body:
## Earth is f\*cked

Right now, climate change is devastating all humanity and there is a 600 Billion dollar funding gap for it ([source](https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2019/08/sustainable-development-funding-is-broken-heres-how-to-fix-it/)). Yet, we are still pouring our money into luxuries which diminish the state of our earth. If we don’t do something to support the environment, the earth will truly be f\*cked.

## Our mission

We are living in a capitalistic system driven by money: making money the most effective driver for change. To renew the economy into a greener one, we must channel more economic activity and funding into sustainable companies.

### Current philanthropic organizations are not effective

One of the major entities in supporting social impact initiatives is philanthropic organizations. But, they operate confidentially. So, when we intend to donate our pocket change toward global causes, we don’t know where the money really ends up.

Moreover, philanthropic organizations aim to address the short-term hurdle (ex. logging). We believe that investing in scalable projects that overcome sustainable problems at their roots

### Blockchain enables everyone to invest in sustainable impact

For the last decade, groups of wealthy investors all over the world have been working to support, and invest in social impact initiatives and innovations. Yet, we, everyday investors are left out due to the lack of infrastructure.

We envision a community, regardless of contribution amount, that can band together to invest in sustainable impact.

Through recent explorations using blockchain technology, new forms of decentralized communities emerged and paved the path for making this a reality.

We are using a DAO to create a democratized and inclusive investment community thats scalable.

## What we are working on

We are building ArborDAO, a DAO that collectively invests in sustainability startups using crypto.

We want to become an early fund for green founders who are seeking support, a collective investment community through crypto, and a community bridge for anyone to support green projects.

## We need you!

Everyone is welcome to ArborDAO. Whether you are an aspiring climate activist or a VC who is looking to support the green sector, we would love for you to join our journey in reversing climate change.

\-🌳 Team

Twitter: [@arbordao](https://twitter.com/arbordao)

Discord [community](https://discord.com/invite/QkexeskWDd)

title: DAOTOOL101 #4: Gitcoin for Open Source Coordination & Funding
body:
*Author(s): FINE | FINE#8385*

*Editor(s): [zerohash](https://twitter.com/xdxp) | Tet#7609*

*Last updated: 19th April 2022*


***

## What is Gitcoin?

Gitcoin is a blockchain-based platform to connect and work together on open-source software for projects, independent builders, and funders. It has funded notable projects including Uniswap, 1Inch, Yearn Finance, and more. It was founded by Scott Moore, Kevin Owocki, and Vivek Singh in November 2017.

## Key features of Gitcoin

**Earn:** Help develop public goods by offering bounties to those who work on open source projects, organize hackathons and other fundraisers sponsored by some of the most innovative Web3 organizations, or start a new initiative to help solve some of humanity’s most pressing coordination problems.

* [Earn in bounties](https://gitcoin.co/explorer?network=mainnet&applicants=ALL&order_by=-_val_usd_db)
* [Earn in hackathons](https://gitcoin.co/hackathons)
* [Earn in grants](https://gitcoin.co/grants/)

**Learn:** Help build and shape the blockchain industry by participating in hackathons, workshops and roundtable discussions hosted by the experts of the industry. Or, if you’re looking for a more hands-on approach to learning material, why not do what some of our finest minds do and prepare yourself as one of them would? Find them, network with them, and study under their wing. That's right. They are offering a Kernel fellowship program so that you too can become a blockchain Kernel.

* [Learn in a hackathon](https://gitcoin.co/hackathons)
* [Learn through fellowship](https://www.kernel.community/en/)
* [Learn through Quests](https://gitcoin.co/quests)

**Connect:** Join the next generation of web developers as you connect and build with top open source developers in the space. Find peers who compliment your skillset and team up to take on bounties and hackathons. Or join their 8 week Kernel fellowship program online where they mentor, guide and support each other through hands-on training while engaging in weekly meet-ups and workshops!

* [Connect through fellowship](https://www.kernel.community/en/)
* [Connect through building](https://gitcoin.co/hackathons)

**Funding:** Fund the open web and shape its future. Choose the projects and technology you believe are most vital to the health of this world, and contribute to them directly during quarterly Gitcoin Grants rounds which use quadratic funding.

* [Fund grants](https://gitcoin.co/grants/)

## How do Gitcoin Grants work?

It starts with a Grant page, a pool of funds, and a community of contributors.

Grants begin with a page for your project and a pool of matching funds. Using the power of quadratic funding, donors will signal their support for grantees and democratically decide where the matching funds should go.

If you’re a grantee, one of the important things to note is that the number and amount of each contribution to your project influences the total amount allocated to you. If you’re a contributor, even a small contribution can have a huge impact on the amount of matching funding a grantee gets .This is the power of quadratic funding.

For example:

> Traditional matching<!-- -->Grant 1 gets $100.<!-- -->Grant 2 gets $100.<!-- -->At the end of the round, both grants get $100 in matching.

> Gitcoin quadratic matching<!-- -->Grant 1 gets $100 from 1 funder.<!-- -->Grant 2 gets $100 from 10 funders.<!-- -->At the end of the round, Grant 1 gets $10 in matching, Grant 2 gets $190 in matching.

See how a number of small contributions can have a huge impact on the total amount of matching funding a grantee gets!

Gitcoin Grants is really all about communities coming together to help fund and signal support for public goods.

### How to create a Grant?

1\. Select [Create an Grant](https://gitcoin.co/grants/new)

2\. Fill out the form

![Fill in the eligibility details.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FebhqbJYbSygpWAbPhSLSC.png&w=2048&q=90)

Fill in the eligibility details.

![Fill in the grant details.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FT0m4PspgJeXGKJ1IDsZ-w.png&w=1920&q=90)

Fill in the grant details.

![Fill in the grant ownership information.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FpTY_J6vqd3JWxenUKcGua.png&w=2048&q=90)

Fill in the grant ownership information.

3\. Click `Confirm`. Grant will be live after a review.

### Fund your GitHub issue

1\. Create a Github Issue (you'll need the issue URL)

2\. Fill out the form

![Choose the source of funding for your bounty.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Fc3Xkwh7AGmJJ4U5IbTQ_9.png&w=1920&q=90)

Choose the source of funding for your bounty.

![Input the appropriate Issue URL.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FZZGUSdroYo7rcW5qpoMjG.png&w=1920&q=90)

Input the appropriate Issue URL.

3\. Select the type of issue to fund

![Fill in the relevant bounty information.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Fin7taqukv5JO_TfTdUoGM.png&w=1920&q=90)

Fill in the relevant bounty information.

4\. Complete the [form](https://gitcoin.co/funding/new) and press `Fund Issue`

![Input any other relevant information.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FT41YhDFY0swQv9PYJ-m3i.png&w=2048&q=90)

Input any other relevant information.

![You can also advertise your bounty for an extra cost of 12 USD.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FPU3XKx8zCJI-PgqmGhl9a.png&w=2048&q=90)

You can also advertise your bounty for an extra cost of 12 USD.

5\. Confirm the transaction in your web3 wallet

Once confirmed on blockchain, your bounty is posted to Gitcoin! Wait for developers across the world to discover your bounty and start working on your issue.

### How does the Hackathon work?

1\. Check out the Prizes

Try picking interesting prizes to work on.

![Skim through Gitcoin's list of active hackathons.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FNbUPS7Cl6eV7hGjjL9u7Z.png&w=3840&q=90)

Skim through Gitcoin's list of active hackathons.

2\. Join the Hackathons Chat Workspace

Join the Hackathons Chat Workspace. Chat with other hackers and find or create a team in one place. Get advice, guidance and support from individuals and sponsors alike.

![Jump in to have a chat.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2F4kKFnV5CyzyASeFyMDa8m.png&w=3840&q=90)

Jump in to have a chat.

3\. Start Work via Gitcoin

Now that you’ve got your team of engineers, start work today by visiting every GitHub bounty page on Gitcoin and click the “Start Work” button on bounties you are willing to work on.

![Choose a project and get working.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2F01s4RCpFj5Hgcy76Abd16.png&w=2048&q=90)

Choose a project and get working.

4\. BUIDL!

Realize your idea into a living prototype with finely-tuned features!

5\. Submit Work via Gitcoin

When your project is complete, make sure that you’re ready to submit it. Make sure that, if you are using a Dropbox folder, it has been saved. When the project is completely uploaded, click the “Submit Work” button and wait for confirmation of the submission.

![Submit your details to receive compensation.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Flknx5PGGWtTE7ebR9AjL9.png&w=1920&q=90)

Submit your details to receive compensation.

### How to Earn in bounties?

1\. Select a [bounty](https://gitcoin.co/explorer?network=mainnet&applicants=ALL&order_by=-_val_usd_db)

![Select an appropriate bounty.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FragMUydvxrC22nKd-Kg0G.png&w=3840&q=90)

Select an appropriate bounty.

2\. Check the description

![Check out the bounty description.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FBmlLwwS1z8UUCKNJVF7F5.png&w=3840&q=90)

Check out the bounty description.

3\. Click `Start Work`

4\. Submit a Plan

![Submit an action plan for the bounty.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2F7-184RYlWrVvC-T-02nLg.png&w=1920&q=90)

Submit an action plan for the bounty.

5\. Submit Work

![Submit your details to receive compensation.](https://peopledao.mirror.xyz/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FcO1ta2NXPcARhvDgJdpxw.png&w=1920&q=90)

Submit your details to receive compensation.

6\. Earn

### Summary

There's so much that can be done to improve the digital world, and that's exactly why Gitcoin is here. With more than 311,668 active developers coming from every part of the world wide web, Gitcoin has everything you need to do whatever you'd like while getting funded by like-minded people. So what are you waiting for? Check out their Github page now!

title: The DAO Story of FINE#8385
body:
Hey! I am FINE & I am doing fine. I will be honest, I am no story teller but I want my story to be out there! Why? Because of the possibilities and opportunities that DAOs are offering right now for everyone. We are entering a new age, an age where age, color, caste, nationality, religion or nothing matters for earning or owning something. What you need is an internet connection and basic ideas about how these DAO things work to make a living, to build your empire or even To start a movement. Okay let's start.

I am an 18year old boy in India working part time for DAOs. What will make most of you interested is the fact that I can earn more than 400 dollars  for a couple of hours mainly because of my knowledge in this field and guys I am just getting started. I know the amount is no big deal but the way I am earning it is something all of you should care about! Why? There is no escape from new technology, when the internet came everyone had no option but to go with it, that's how new tech works. Entered DAOs only in the beginning of march. In case you don't know what a DAO is, it is a decentralized autonomous organization that means an organization that runs by code and no major person has the final say and instead the community has the major say. How is all this possible? Well the answer is Blockchain technology. A new technology is also = things happening that never happened in human history before! Actually I have a lot to say and donno where to start. I may derail from the track from what I am saying so please stick with me.

I got hyped about blockchain technology after watching the [comments of top tech leaders](https://youtu.be/GVN0Ddr3xig) on blockchain technology. I started just like most of the people, started trading crypto currency and lost money, my entry to crypto was in July 2021. Started heavily learning about everything from the [Coin Bureau](https://youtu.be/Fu4lrv47c0g) youtube channel and the journey of 8months led me to the gem DAOs!! 

I just lost interest in making money and wanted to follow my heart. I always wanted to serve humanity, so I setted out to start an organisation! An organisation where anyone can tell their problems and anyone can make a living for solving those problems! Ironically the organisation name is also FINE. I got this name from my Father, he is a hardworking man who just can't stop working!(farmer blood). Even though the project is still down I learned something. This is something I always knew but I think I fully understood it only when I experienced it. I was behind money making = no value. I was behind something of value to the world and all of a sudden I started earning! 

I went to ARAGON DAO to create and manage DAO as it is the go to place for everyone of DAOs, the community was really helpful specially anson parker. 

I saw a bounty there. They were looking for Hindi translators to translate their documents. I was 99% sure that I wouldn't get it, as there were many better candidates than me. Still I applied and I remember those lines " Hey! I am a student and I understand 5 languages " 

A person who goes by the Identity @Lion917 reached out to me and guided me to Bankless South Asia DAO!** 
 **

I started as a Malayalam translator there using my 4years old complaint phone Vivo Y55s. Pointing it out just to say that. We don't need a heavy setup to earn or start, it definitely helps but it would be better if we just start right away with what we have and trust me it is more than enough!

No one will judge you here. We just respect the effort and give maximum support expecting nothing in return! I had knowledge in blockchain space for the past 7months so it was not that kind of a big deal for me to trust everything. For a beginner it would be hard but the community will help you out. Beware of scams please.. There are plenty of them. Okay coming to the point. I am now working for an Internet community without knowing anyone's name and not revealing my own identity. Here skills matter more than certificates. I was getting paid in an internet currency or governance token. Hey, here is another big deal of working for DAOs. In our real life we get paid in fiat currency if we work for an organisation but here we get the share of the company i.e. governance token = you have a say or you can shape the future of the organisation you are working for!! About hierarchical structure, here we the contributors have the say. Let me get back to my experiences.

I received my first payment at the end of the month and I felt sooo proud; it was proof that all my weird thoughts(for the majority) were true. This is an untaken path for the masses for now. I then started attending the weekly meetings which were more than amazing!! There is this Awesome guy called @0xbaer who made me really comfortable there. Guided me through everything and even helped me through everything. Another thing to point out is everybody is kind here. One reason is because if we are not we will be kicked. My 1st bounty work was pathetic. I understood it only later. They carefully started pointing out everything I did right and then requested me to make some parts better. Later I started attending weekly meetings which lead me to more opportunities. Attending meetings is another great way to get involved heavily.

I then became a marketer, content creator, reviewer and even the coordinator! The growth was exponential. If I was going with the masses, I would be attending school and hating the things I should be learning etc etc but here, I was so damn interested in learning as everything was helping me right away. Actually I was getting paid for learning if we look through this angle. Reading newsletter = learning. I was learning and getting exposed to outside parties. I was getting guided In the right direction. I wanted to work full time for DAOs and started joining other DAOs and started using the same butterfly principle again. 

A guy named @enfin reached out to me and introduced peopleDAO and Language DAO! Attended some meetings and I am part of the accounting team, writer, multi Sig signer and Mod operator! I had no prior experience doing any of these!! 

The point is everything is flexible here, if you are willing to take the effort this is a golden opportunity! I am a person who lives by the lines: Never trade time for money!! I am so comfortable here as there Is meaning for the time I am spending. I am getting ownership in the community! 

There are no bad vibe hierarchies here. I have to speak about @jengajojo.eth. An amazing person, Leader of IMN. I am pretty sure he is super solid and busy! I didn't know it and was always reaching out to him for doubts and help. He was replying ASAP and helping, which doesn't make sense if we look at our traditional hierarchies. Can we just go to the MD and say: hey i don't know what to do! ? No right? I am not saying that there is no hierarchical structure here. In Fact we do and there is no escape from hierarchies in any creative domains. I just didn't know whom I should be talking to and I went to Jenga. 90% of the people you see here will be like that. That's what from my experience I understood. 

Hey! Another thing, did you know that you could get paid just for chilling?? Well there are rewards for active community members also. What that literally means is a little earning just for being active in the community. I said little just because I don't want to sound like DAOs get rich quickly. When you are an experienced person with knowledge it is easy. We need ideas about these things mainly. For example we haven't learned how exactly you are able to read this but you know how to read and benefit from this! We don't fully understand the working mechanism behind calls but we do have business calls with it. What I am trying to say is as long as you have trust in all these things and the idea, you can do anything.

Working for DAOs is like having a taste of the future! 

** 
  
  
 **

title: ArborDAO Whitepaper
body:
## Earth is f\*cked

Right now, climate change is devastating all humanity and there is a 600 Billion dollar funding gap for it ([source](https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2019/08/sustainable-development-funding-is-broken-heres-how-to-fix-it/)). Yet, we are still pouring our money into luxuries which diminish the state of our earth. If we don’t do something to support the environment, the earth will truly be f\*cked.

## Our mission

We are living in a capitalistic system driven by money: making money the most effective driver for change. To renew the economy into a greener one, we must channel more economic activity and funding into sustainable companies.

### Current philanthropic organizations are not effective

One of the major entities in supporting social impact initiatives is philanthropic organizations. But, they operate confidentially. So, when we intend to donate our pocket change toward global causes, we don’t know where the money really ends up.

Moreover, philanthropic organizations aim to address the short-term hurdle (ex. logging). We believe that investing in scalable projects that overcome sustainable problems at their roots

### Blockchain enables everyone to invest in sustainable impact

For the last decade, groups of wealthy investors all over the world have been working to support, and invest in social impact initiatives and innovations. Yet, we, everyday investors are left out due to the lack of infrastructure.

We envision a community, regardless of contribution amount, that can band together to invest in sustainable impact.

Through recent explorations using blockchain technology, new forms of decentralized communities emerged and paved the path for making this a reality.

We are using a DAO to create a democratized and inclusive investment community thats scalable.

## What we are working on

We are building ArborDAO, a DAO that collectively invests in sustainability startups using crypto.

We want to become an early fund for green founders who are seeking support, a collective investment community through crypto, and a community bridge for anyone to support green projects.

## We need you!

Everyone is welcome to ArborDAO. Whether you are an aspiring climate activist or a VC who is looking to support the green sector, we would love for you to join our journey in reversing climate change. We would appreciate donations to support development.

\-🌳 Team

Twitter: [@arbordao](https://twitter.com/arbordao)

Discord [community](https://discord.com/invite/QkexeskWDd)

title: 做菜与干饭
body:
喜欢看做菜视频，不论是乡村的、城市的、中国的、欧洲的，只要看到有人做饭的画面，就忍不住停下来看看——原料、配料、刀工、有无特别处理方法、处理顺序与对应解说。

有时候也看干饭视频，但我实在不喜欢看自媒体拍的。

当我看到男男女女，对着镜头，使劲儿表现惊喜，睁大眼睛，竖起大拇指，仿佛这辈子以前没吃过类似的物品，此情此景，让我感到费劲与不真实：你吃什么都好吃，那如何能知道究竟什么好吃呢？

《寻味顺德》和《人生一串》这种，我就看得很投入，我逐渐理解了自己的偏好。我喜欢的是了解制作过程以及随机的食客采访，不论最后的食物怎么样，在这两个切面里才有值得观看的真实。

title: 每日精选好文十篇 第6期
body:
> 每天十条、只要十篇；日拱一卒、持续精进！
>
> 所有《每日精选好文》均可以通过[rich123.com](https://mirror.xyz/btcdayu.eth/jNA-5Oe6HOIDGTxY_NAI57oG9qe-80G9GT8Xq3tbwh4)随时访问。

* 以太坊合并的理想与现实
* ETH合并的投资机会——我眼中的“正向灰犀牛”事件
* ENS 拨云见日 —— 项目与交易数据分析
* DeFi“钱从哪来”？一个大多数人都没搞清楚的问题
* 疑点重重，融资1亿美金的新公链5ire或是骗局
* 灰度：图解市场周期规律，熊市还有8个月
* 下轮牛市何时来，因何而来
* 从web3历史中，寻找未来的方向
* 相关性是一张纸，论加密&美股稳定与不稳定的联系
* 1欧元＜1美元，跌破的不只是汇率

## 1）《以太坊合并的理想与现实》

必读深读长文，从乐观和悲观两个层面，讲清机遇与风险，尤其是风险部分——你以为的全无风险很可能是巨大风险。

[https://posts.careerengine.us/p/62d55ced42c598353547625d?from=latest-posts-panel&type=title](https://posts.careerengine.us/p/62d55ced42c598353547625d?from=latest-posts-panel&type=title)

## 2）《ETH合并的投资机会——我眼中的“正向灰犀牛”事件》

简评：文章来自 @cry_pto33 ，有着浓烈的个人风格，他认为此次合并，即使目前大涨，但其重大意义仍然被人忽视，明确给出观点，即合并会导致在9-10月让ETH产生超额回报。

文章偏乐观，但论据细致充分，值得阅读。

[https://mirror.xyz/crypto33.eth/EC3DL2pINE6qQaLWijt3nQeyHYjcdbQs9s4EP8OvA8E](https://mirror.xyz/crypto33.eth/EC3DL2pINE6qQaLWijt3nQeyHYjcdbQs9s4EP8OvA8E)

## 3）《ENS 拨云见日 —— 项目与交易数据分析》

简评： $ENS 是ETH是的王牌项目，无论是早期大方的空投，还是近期域名的火爆，都让我们值得系统地去弄懂：

$ENS 是否值得买入？什么时候买？风险和收益点都在哪？

这可能是目前最全的一篇好文。

[https://w3hitchhiker.substack.com/p/ens-](https://w3hitchhiker.substack.com/p/ens-)

## 4）《DeFi“钱从哪来”？一个大多数人都没搞清楚的问题》

简评：尽管DeFI系代币受到重创，但这是区块链领域极为确定的赛道，经历风险之后 $aave 等项目必将迎来更大发展。

DeFI中有句名言：如果你不知道收益从哪来，那很可能你就是那个收益。

文章深入浅出，一文读懂。

[https://www.hellobtc.com/kp/du/06/3967.html](https://www.hellobtc.com/kp/du/06/3967.html)

## 5）《疑点重重，融资1亿美金的新公链5ire或是骗局》

简评：来自panews的原创文章，在原来脸书系的团队接连收到多方投资，多条新公链呼之欲出时，又一条公链融资1亿。

但根据调查，这竟然很有可能是一个骗局。

他们要骗什么？PANEWS是从哪些角度去调查的？很有学习价值。

[https://www.panewslab.com/zh/articledetails/66krmxby.html](https://www.panewslab.com/zh/articledetails/66krmxby.html)

## 6）《灰度：图解市场周期规律，熊市还有8个月》

简评：灰度是近轮牛市的引爆器，虽然在牛市结束时，他变身为终结者，但他的观点值得重视。

文章回顾了币圈的4次大周期，以图表的形式进行了生动而细致的分析，并对未来进行了展望。

值得一读。

[https://www.odaily.news/post/5180328](https://www.odaily.news/post/5180328)

## 7）《下轮牛市何时来，因何而来》

简评：平庸交易员用技术交易，顶尖交易员用信念投资，而信念来自于对规律的认识。

这篇来自机构的雄文同样分析了过往几轮牛市的原因，并结合宏观经济形势、区块链行业发展等下轮牛市做出了预测：

熊市还有3个月结束，底部15000。

[https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/4Ot_BgzXJhXKHkXBvLfllw](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/4Ot_BgzXJhXKHkXBvLfllw)

## 8）《从web3历史中，寻找未来的方向》

简评：在币圈，关注短期价格多是亏损，关注周期趋势算是进阶，而在周期的基础上，去思考和尝试把握行业的方向，会让我们在周期中收获更多。

这篇文章从行业创业者的角度，回顾历史、展望未来，并提出行业可能的一些大爆发的方向。

[https://mirror.xyz/web3fox.eth/X-A6aYvDOJ8hYmkQg92SyWQ3tYlxyUfmzHaX1JnHAZ4](https://mirror.xyz/web3fox.eth/X-A6aYvDOJ8hYmkQg92SyWQ3tYlxyUfmzHaX1JnHAZ4)

## 9）《相关性是一张纸，论加密&美股稳定与不稳定的联系》

简评：来自 @7upDAO 的研究员 @cheng_shutong 的一篇好文。

文章要点是一方面认可当前币圈与美股之间的强关联性，同时期待底层设施等币圈的超级项目在将来脱离美股。

币安一开始寻求纳指上市，如今已不再必要。

[https://chengshutong.notion.site/b5bfee1372b4451691c15a3b463b926f](https://chengshutong.notion.site/b5bfee1372b4451691c15a3b463b926f)

## 10）《1欧元＜1美元，跌破的不只是汇率》

简评：投资币圈也要跳出币圈看。

20年来，欧元对美元汇率首次跌破了1比1，我们在一次次见证历史！

[https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/K8AYoK0CB4ZiQCT26dA1Eg](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/K8AYoK0CB4ZiQCT26dA1Eg)

title: ArborDAO - Investing For Sustainability
body:
## Earth is f\*cked

Right now, climate change is devastating all humanity and there is a 600 Billion dollar funding gap for it ([source](https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2019/08/sustainable-development-funding-is-broken-heres-how-to-fix-it/)). Yet, we are still pouring our money into luxuries which diminish the state of our earth. If we don’t do something to support the environment, the earth will truly be f\*cked.

## Our mission

We are living in a capitalistic system driven by money: making money the most effective driver for change. To renew the economy into a greener one, we must channel more economic activity and funding into sustainable companies.

### Current philanthropic organizations are not effective

One of the major entities in supporting social impact initiatives is philanthropic organizations. But, they operate confidentially. So, when we intend to donate our pocket change toward global causes, we don’t know where the money really ends up.

Moreover, philanthropic organizations aim to address the short-term hurdle (ex. logging). We believe that investing in scalable projects that overcome sustainable problems at their roots

### Blockchain enables everyone to invest in sustainable impact

For the last decade, groups of wealthy investors all over the world have been working to support, and invest in social impact initiatives and innovations. Yet, we, everyday investors are left out due to the lack of infrastructure.

We envision a community, regardless of contribution amount, that can band together to invest in sustainable impact.

Through recent explorations using blockchain technology, new forms of decentralized communities emerged and paved the path for making this a reality.

We are using a DAO to create a democratized and inclusive investment community thats scalable.

## What we are working on

We are building ArborDAO, a DAO that collectively invests in sustainability startups using crypto.

We want to become an early fund for green founders who are seeking support, a collective investment community through crypto, and a community bridge for anyone to support green projects.

## We need you!

Everyone is welcome to ArborDAO. Whether you are an aspiring climate activist or a VC who is looking to support the green sector, we would love for you to join our journey in reversing climate change.

\-🌳 Team

Twitter: [@arbordao](https://twitter.com/arbordao)

Discord [community](https://discord.com/invite/QkexeskWDd)

title: Zk.money - incognito Defi & alternatywa dla tornadocash z potencjałem na dropa?
body:
## zk.money - prywatna warstwa dla Web 3.0 na silniku Aztec.Network - kilka słów o technologii.

Dziś Popuś napisze Wam kilka słów o technologii, która jest bliska moim poglądom.  
 Tak tak, fuck-the-system , JP, HWDP na 100%! I tak rozumcie zk.money bo coś w tym jest. 😜

 
 Od razu napiszę, że nie mam się za jakiegoś GURU. Napiszę to co wiem, a wiem pewnie troszkę więcej niż ty ziom. Postaram się pisać językiem abyś mnie zrozumiał.  
 Jest to też potencjalna spekulacja. Większość osób ma oczy skierowane w kierunku **#StarkNet**. Ja zwykle stoję z boku i obserwuję podobne protokoły, które mają mniejszy socialhype i fajnie się rozwijają. Dlatego dziś będzie o zk.money a nie o StarkNet.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2K-1MxaAX1hUd0dQuMUUs.png?height=607&width=1694)

## zk.money - warstwa 2 na ETH skupiona na prywatności 👀

[zk.money](https://twitter.com/aztecnetwork) to dApps do ochrony prywatności w warstwie 2 umożliwiająca użytkownikom prywatne przesyłanie **$ETH, $DAI & $renBTC** ( renBTC *był w v1 ale v2 obecnie off - wróci, spokojnie*). Zk.Money jest zbudowane na silniku [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) (*Zk-Rollup na Eth)* w technologi zkSNARK . Aztec jest porównywalny do [zkSync](https://medium.com/@CalendarDefi/airdrop-guide-zksync-zigzag-a83ef3b33b70), ale koncentruje się na prywatności, której w zkSync brak imo. Więcej o ich wizji przeczytasz [tutaj](https://aztec.network/vision).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XME4s721Yez0zhziC8YLK.png?height=891&width=2545)

**Podam prosty przykład anonimowej wysyłki $ETH :**

* **Deponujesz** *(shield) *$ETH **lub** $DAI z mainetu na **zk-money L2 
 **
* Znając **alias *(login)*** drugiej osoby wysyłasz jej $ETH lub $Dai po L2 (sobie, delerowi, whatever). Koszt transakcji bardzo niski (L2). Dzięki technologi **zero-knowledge proof** druga strona otrzyma ETH, ale nie będzie wiadomo od kogo. Co ciekawsze ty jako wysyłający masz dostęp do potwierdzenia, że transakcja pochodzi od Ciebie (gdyby zaszła taka potrzeba to, to potwierdzisz).  
 **Nikt inny nie ma do tego dostępu bez twojego walletu!**  
 
* Gdy zamiast aliasu odbiorcy podasz adres ethereum środki zostaną wysłane na mainet. I ten przykład w moim przypadku ma utility w kwestiach spekulacji & sybilu na multiwalletach. Rozumiesz schemat prawda? Ahhh, jak ja dużo Ci mówię…🤫

## Dobra spekulancie, wiem co interesuje Cię najbardziej… Co ja tam mam robić niby, co?🤫

[Zk.Money](https://zk.money/) i sieć [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) działają już na mainecie. Ani jedno, ani drugie nie ma jeszcze tokena. Czy będzie ? Czas pokaże. Ja obserwuje i klikam bo jara mnie ta technologia. Uważam, że *Satoshi Nakamoto* byłby dumny z tego co tu się odpierdala. Jak ktoś podchodzi do tematu czysto spekulacyjnie to uważam, że jest teraz na to dobry czas. Dlaczego? Niedawno przeszli na mainet. Ruski gas od Vitalika, też nie taki straszny, jak straszą nas w mediach głównego ścieku 🤮

### Dobra - napiszę, co tam do przeklikania

Na początek musisz wejść na [zk.money](https://zk.money/signup) połączyć portfel (np. Metamask) i stworzyć swój alias 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2WIEKnA3MGihB0EOc2p8B.png?height=993&width=1635)

Następnie podpisać kilka transakcji i go zarejestrować, po czym zdeponować minimum **0.01 ETH** w celu aktywacji konta.  
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MB-G30l7eZtNDojkifd3f.png?height=2151&width=3117)

**Włalaaaa - Done!** Masz już swój alias i interakcje z kontraktem.  
  
 **UWAGA!** Zapisz swój alias bo gdy go utracisz -- utracisz swoje środki.  
 W zkmoney **.v1** gdy nie pamiętaliśmy swojego aliasu można było wygenerować nowy. W **.v2** jest to niemożliwe! 
  
 Warto pójść o krok dalej i popatrzyć co protokół ma nam do zaoferowania. 
 Zk.Money V1 oferowało nam jedynie przesyłanie ETH, DAI i renBTC pomiędzy walletami L2 & Mainet. Team postanowił pójść o krok dalej. Obecnie rozwijają private-defi aby na warstwie drugiej poza zwykłym ‘anonimowym’ przesyłaniem wartości dostępne były swapy, stakinngi i inne bajery, które znamy z DEFI. Zaczeli z [LIDO](https://lido.fi/) (staking ETH dla ETH 2.0) - obecnie 4,38% APY. Druga opcja, która już jest wdrożona to staking DAI w współpracy z [ElementFi](https://www.element.fi/) . Znaleść to możemy w zakładce [EARN](https://zk.money/earn). Warto to przeklikać i wrzucić coś ETH do LIDO czy troche DAI do ElementFi na staking. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rS8YpDbaq0A3Kk8agtL7f.png?height=1188&width=2513)

## 👇 Kolejne protokoły soooon ser 👇

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i7DBEBz3n4o8U91Qs04DG.png?height=810&width=2494)

## Co jeszcze warto zrobić?

* Warto przerzucić assety z L2 na Mainet. Aby to zrobić przy wysyłce zamiast aliasu należy wkleić adres ETH *\[0x…\] 
 *
* Warto też przesłać asset po sieci L2. Aby to zrobić należy wkleić nie adres ETH, a alias odbiorcy. Możesz ‘posypać’ Popusiowi. Ahhh. Nie wypada tak mówić. Anyway, jak podoba Ci się, to co robie i tak bardzo chcesz - mój login masz na screenach wyżej. 
 
* Jeśli interesuje Cię więcej, warto dołączyć na [Discord](https://discord.gg/DePA3Uvd)

### UWAGA!

> Co do oficjalnej informacji o *#airdrop*.  Team nic takiego nie potwierdził.  
 Nie potwierdzili też tego, że kiedykolwiek powstanie token. Dodam, że większość potwierdzonych dropów wychodziła słabo. Zgodzisz się ze mną? 
 *“…Cicha woda brzegi rwie!”*  

Na koniec jeszcze jedna uwaga. Jeśli obserwujesz mnie dłużej to pewnie o zk.money już wiesz i bawiłeś się tam już na v1. Jeśli tak to zaloguj się na [old.zk.money](https://old.zk.money/) i przenieś swoje assety na L1 po czym dokonaj ponownej migracji na L2 tworząc nowy alias. Tak mi doradzono na discordzie i tak zrobiłem. 

Temat będę obserwował dalej. Jeśli Cię to zainteresowało zapraszam do mnie na telegram i twitter aby być na bieżąco.

* [Twitter Popek1990.eth](https://twitter.com/popek1990crypto)
* [Telegram Popek1990.ETH \[Ogłoszenia\]](https://t.me/popek1990crypto)

```
Dyskusje w komentarzach na twitter ✌️
```

[zk.money](https://twitter.com/aztecnetwork) to dApps do ochrony prywatności w warstwie 2 umożliwiająca użytkownikom prywatne przesyłanie **$ETH, $DAI & $renBTC** ( renBTC *był w v1 ale v2 obecnie off - wróci, spokojnie*). Zk.Money jest zbudowane na silniku [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) (*Zk-Rollup na Eth)* w technologi zkSNARK . Aztec jest porównywalny do [zkSync](https://medium.com/@CalendarDefi/airdrop-guide-zksync-zigzag-a83ef3b33b70), ale koncentruje się na prywatności, której w zkSync brak imo. Więcej o ich wizji przeczytasz [tutaj](https://aztec.network/vision).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XME4s721Yez0zhziC8YLK.png?height=891&width=2545)

**Podam prosty przykład anonimowej wysyłki $ETH :**

* **Deponujesz** *(shield) *$ETH **lub** $DAI z mainetu na **zk-money L2 
 **
* Znając **alias *(login)*** drugiej osoby wysyłasz jej $ETH lub $Dai po L2 (sobie, delerowi, whatever). Koszt transakcji bardzo niski (L2). Dzięki technologi **zero-knowledge proof** druga strona otrzyma ETH, ale nie będzie wiadomo od kogo. Co ciekawsze ty jako wysyłający masz dostęp do potwierdzenia, że transakcja pochodzi od Ciebie (gdyby zaszła taka potrzeba to, to potwierdzisz).  
 **Nikt inny nie ma do tego dostępu bez twojego walletu!**  
 
* Gdy zamiast aliasu odbiorcy podasz adres ethereum środki zostaną wysłane na mainet. I ten przykład w moim przypadku ma utility w kwestiach spekulacji & sybilu na multiwalletach. Rozumiesz schemat prawda? Ahhh, jak ja dużo Ci mówię…🤫

## Dobra spekulancie, wiem co interesuje Cię najbardziej… Co ja tam mam robić niby, co?🤫

[Zk.Money](https://zk.money/) i sieć [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) działają już na mainecie. Ani jedno, ani drugie nie ma jeszcze tokena. Czy będzie ? Czas pokaże. Ja obserwuje i klikam bo jara mnie ta technologia. Uważam, że *Satoshi Nakamoto* byłby dumny z tego co tu się odpierdala. Jak ktoś podchodzi do tematu czysto spekulacyjnie to uważam, że jest teraz na to dobry czas. Dlaczego? Niedawno przeszli na mainet. Ruski gas od Vitalika, też nie taki straszny, jak straszą nas w mediach głównego ścieku 🤮

### Dobra - napiszę, co tam do przeklikania

Na początek musisz wejść na [zk.money](https://zk.money/signup) połączyć portfel (np. Metamask) i stworzyć swój alias 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2WIEKnA3MGihB0EOc2p8B.png?height=993&width=1635)

Następnie podpisać kilka transakcji i go zarejestrować, po czym zdeponować minimum **0.01 ETH** w celu aktywacji konta.  
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MB-G30l7eZtNDojkifd3f.png?height=2151&width=3117)

**Włalaaaa - Done!** Masz już swój alias i interakcje z kontraktem.  
  
 **UWAGA!** Zapisz swój alias bo gdy go utracisz -- utracisz swoje środki.  
 W zkmoney **.v1** gdy nie pamiętaliśmy swojego aliasu można było wygenerować nowy. W **.v2** jest to niemożliwe! 
  
 Warto pójść o krok dalej i popatrzyć co protokół ma nam do zaoferowania. 
 Zk.Money V1 oferowało nam jedynie przesyłanie ETH, DAI i renBTC pomiędzy walletami L2 & Mainet. Team postanowił pójść o krok dalej. Obecnie rozwijają private-defi aby na warstwie drugiej poza zwykłym ‘anonimowym’ przesyłaniem wartości dostępne były swapy, stakinngi i inne bajery, które znamy z DEFI. Zaczeli z [LIDO](https://lido.fi/) (staking ETH dla ETH 2.0) - obecnie 4,38% APY. Druga opcja, która już jest wdrożona to staking DAI w współpracy z [ElementFi](https://www.element.fi/) . Znaleść to możemy w zakładce [EARN](https://zk.money/earn). Warto to przeklikać i wrzucić coś ETH do LIDO czy troche DAI do ElementFi na staking. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rS8YpDbaq0A3Kk8agtL7f.png?height=1188&width=2513)

## 👇 Kolejne protokoły soooon ser 👇

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i7DBEBz3n4o8U91Qs04DG.png?height=810&width=2494)

## Co jeszcze warto zrobić?

* Warto przerzucić assety z L2 na Mainet. Aby to zrobić przy wysyłce zamiast aliasu należy wkleić adres ETH *\[0x…\] 
 *
* Warto też przesłać asset po sieci L2. Aby to zrobić należy wkleić nie adres ETH, a alias odbiorcy. Możesz ‘posypać’ Popusiowi. Ahhh. Nie wypada tak mówić. Anyway, jak podoba Ci się, to co robie i tak bardzo chcesz - mój login masz na screenach wyżej. 
 
* Jeśli interesuje Cię więcej, warto dołączyć na [Discord](https://discord.gg/DePA3Uvd)

### UWAGA!

> Co do oficjalnej informacji o *#airdrop*.  Team nic takiego nie potwierdził.  
 Nie potwierdzili też tego, że kiedykolwiek powstanie token. Dodam, że większość potwierdzonych dropów wychodziła słabo. Zgodzisz się ze mną? 
 *“…Cicha woda brzegi rwie!”*  

Na koniec jeszcze jedna uwaga. Jeśli obserwujesz mnie dłużej to pewnie o zk.money już wiesz i bawiłeś się tam już na v1. Jeśli tak to zaloguj się na [old.zk.money](https://old.zk.money/) i przenieś swoje assety na L1 po czym dokonaj ponownej migracji na L2 tworząc nowy alias. Tak mi doradzono na discordzie i tak zrobiłem. 

Temat będę obserwował dalej. Jeśli Cię to zainteresowało zapraszam do mnie na telegram i twitter aby być na bieżąco.

* [Twitter Popek1990.eth](https://twitter.com/popek1990crypto)
* [Telegram Popek1990.ETH \[Ogłoszenia\]](https://t.me/popek1990crypto)

```
Dyskusje w komentarzach na twitter ✌️
```
