title: 【导演】7.20日行情分析，熊途路漫漫，大饼算是突破了后面还是回调继续做多为主，整体一个中线反弹走势。
body:
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​**导演第750篇原创每日行情分析** 
 **2022.07.20**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aG3XaywOFMltwqWwxXBAV.jpg?height=383&width=900)

**​一、市场情绪：** 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NqSyMmRy6cwMQ7Nc1JjUm.png?height=358&width=825)

**​二、图表结构：**

**1、大饼：** 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TGWaT8Zbwnss3VC9Duunj.png?height=573&width=1476)

大饼4H的结构： 
       千呼万唤始出来大饼终于是突破了这个4H的中枢结构了，既然突破了那么后面的回踩都是继续做多为主的走势。

​      而且这笔4H的上是还没有结束的，内部只走了一笔1H的上，第二笔1H的回调依然还是没有走出来的，所以后续的回调继续做多。

​        不过我们应该关注下特斯拉的财报即可，表现的好大饼能够继续往上突突，还需要注意的是27号的加息的预期。

​       目前市场的上涨都是基于这个月CPI是最高点，那么8月份如果CPI好一些的话可能会有更好的市场反应。 
  

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DpHnWOWitrdMxV_uCawLY.png?height=723&width=1815)

 
 大饼1H的结构：

​       目前大饼还是第一笔1H的上，整体的走势还是非常的强劲的，后面的回调也只是回调，短中期还是看涨为主，目前是大饼占有率要处于一个上升的阶段，所以大饼可能会表现的比以太强势一些，做多大饼收益会更好一些。

 

 

**2、姨太：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/O8DapYcMCFL41iEcnWMvp.png?height=630&width=2039)

**​**以太4H的结构：

​        以太的走势就是盯着个中枢上沿的三买的机会，预期会在1400-1300这个区域出现，只要不跌破1280那么问题就不大，后面还会有三买继续拉升起来。 
          就是拉升的高度是否会超过前高1631，如果超过前高的话那么依然还是看能否去一趟1750的位置，如果不能够超过前高的话则意味这4H的一笔反弹结束要走一个较大级别的回踩。 
 **3、交易策略：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RywpwjMvX6fKKEAMCZ3DA.jpg?height=1344&width=750)

 

**行情变化太快，很多不能及时提醒，不能够在变化的情况下吧行情说清楚，所以可以关注我的公众号。**

**具体情况群里面会讲清楚，想入群的扫下面二维码。**

**END**

**温馨提示**

投资有风险，闲钱投资，警记永不满仓，不贷款，我们只提供信息，不构成买卖建议，买卖自由，风险自担！

title: 视为止 行为迟
body:
20220719:

屏气凝神，今天就一个大活儿。

早晨按时去公司，按时把规律性的工作都做好，想到了呆波特漫画那个哥们的说法，为了进入最佳状态，就是要有每天规律一致的工作。又想到了考试这个事情，真的不难，只是要进入正确的轨道。

九点十分，我和TY带着各种资料出发，到ZH楼下静等候。其实我们也知道，这个事情的关键点已经不在我们，主要看D和M哥的。楼下休息区静等，没想到D先到，然后大部队到，然后准备开始上楼。会议室挺大，NX的大队人马先到，我们就只好等，P提前十分钟到，Z晚了一两分钟到。

会议到过程还是顺利的，D和M都顺利发挥，Z居然在当面就表示了要重点来推，轮到我发挥的时候其实讲的并不多，但是又D找补回来了。最后顺着Z行说的播种浇水施肥，我们还掏出来了小向日葵，一切都是happy ending。但是我知道，重头戏还在我这边，第一，要跟Z讲南京需要他表态；第二，要跟D讲武汉需要她带人去。这两项不可完成的任务，我也按照计划搞定了。然后就是跟老板们的商业互吹，D，M，R一个一个搞完。就剩下我和S了，我俩都有点累的不想说话了。她去赶飞机飞深圳，我去找团队吃饭继续吹。

下午一直颓着不想动，让事情再发酵一下。

晚上和X少去吃饭，想起来上午Z说的时候讲过RY好像有问题，八卦问了一下，果然他妈出大事了。唉，这下就更理解Z行要尽快行动的意思了。

姚总很意外地出现，姚总真是太美了，明知道她很不靠谱还是想要多看两眼。现在风口浪尖，她的工作压力估计很大。回到家的时候已经很晚了，又去走了STEPN又去弄了吃的。还是太兴奋了。现在做各种决策都不是太理智。

看的书：《原则2》、《我们为什么要睡觉》、《穷查理宝典》、《胆小别看画》、《大唐群星闪耀时》、《下沉年代》、《货币起源》、《资本的秩序》、《缔造和平》、《查拉图斯特拉如是说》、《My life in red and white》、《长夜余火》、《最好的金龟换酒》、《枪炮与货币》、《通胀螺旋》、《世界金融史》、《轴心文明与现代社会》、《失去的三十年》、《大国的崩溃》、《密码朋克》、《涌现》、《投资者人和你想的不一样》、《毛泽东选集》、《雪崩》、《叙事经济学》、《从繁荣到萧条》、《学箭悟禅录》、《以交易为生》、《财富的起源》、《纳瓦尔宝典》、《乔布斯传》、《爱因斯坦传》、《玩家1号》、《门德斯传》、《丘吉尔》、《置身事内》、《危机1520-2021》、《侯大利刑侦笔记8》。

记的话：网络世界只有一种真正的英雄主义，那就是看到了数不胜数的傻逼之后，依然坚持上网。

可计算的定义，做出一个过程可重复，结果可检验。

背景，有一个人拿出了一个凯撒头像的硬币，问这个应该给谁，耶稣回答：上帝的还给上帝，凯撒的还给凯撒。也就是货币还给凯撒，荣耀还给上帝。

title: Zk.money - incognito Defi & alternatywa dla tornadocash z potencjałem na dropa?
body:
## Zk.money - Druga warstwa na ETH z naciskiem na prywatność użytkownika 👁

Dziś Popuś npisał Ci kilka słów o technologii, która jest bliska moim poglądom.  
 Tak tak, *fuck-the-system , JP, HWDP na 100%*! Joke, ale tak należy rozumieć zk.money i stojące za tym zkSNARK bo coś w tym jest 😜

 
 Od razu napiszę, że nie mam się za znachora w tym temacie. Napiszę to co wiem ✌️Postaram się pisać językiem, abyś mnie zrozumiał/a.  
 Jest to też potencjalna spekulacja. Większość osób ma oczy skierowane w kierunku **#StarkNet**. A Popek obserwuję podobne protokoły, które mają mniejszy socialhype, a zarazem fajnie się rozwijają - no i tokena brak. Dlatego dziś będzie o zk.money, a nie o StarkNet.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2K-1MxaAX1hUd0dQuMUUs.png?height=607&width=1694)

## zk.money - warstwa 2 na ETH skupiona na prywatności 👀

**[zk.money](https://twitter.com/aztecnetwork)** to *dApps* do ochrony prywatności w warstwie 2 umożliwiający użytkownikom prywatne przesyłanie **$ETH, $DAI & $renBTC** ( renBTC *był w v1 ale v2 obecnie off - wróci imo*). Zk.Money jest zbudowane na silniku [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) (*Zk-Rollup na Eth)* w technologi zkSNARK . Aztec jest porównywalny do [zkSync](https://medium.com/@CalendarDefi/airdrop-guide-zksync-zigzag-a83ef3b33b70), ale koncentruje się na prywatności, której w zkSync brak. Więcej o ich wizji przeczytasz [tutaj](https://aztec.network/vision).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XME4s721Yez0zhziC8YLK.png?height=891&width=2545)

**Podam prosty przykład anonimowej wysyłki $ETH aby Ci to bardziej zobrazować:**

* **Deponujesz** *(shield) *$ETH **lub** $DAI z mainetu na **zk-money L2 
 **
* Znając **alias *(login)*** drugiej osoby wysyłasz jej $ETH lub $Dai po L2 (sobie, delerowi, whatever). Koszt transakcji bardzo niski (L2). Dzięki technologi **zero-knowledge proof** druga strona otrzyma ETH, ale nadawca nie będzie znany.  
 Co ciekawsze ty jako wysyłający masz dostęp do potwierdzenia, że transakcja pochodzi od Ciebie (gdyby zaszła taka potrzeba to, to potwierdzisz).  
 **Nikt inny nie ma do tego dostępu bez twojego walletu!**  
 
* Gdy zamiast aliasu odbiorcy podasz adres ethereum środki zostaną wysłane na mainet. I ten przykład w moim przypadku ma utility w kwestiach spekulacji na multiwalletach. Wiesz sybil i te sprawy. Czaisz, prawda? Ahhh, jak ja dużo Ci mówię…🤫

## Dobra skończ pie\*\*\* Popku, przejdź do konkretów i mów co to, i po co mi to? 🤫

[Zk.Money](https://zk.money/) i sieć [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) działają już na mainecie. Ani jedno, ani drugie nie ma jeszcze tokena. Czy będzie ? Czas pokaże. Ja obserwuje i klikam bo jara mnie ta technologia. Uważam, że *Satoshi Nakamoto* byłby dumny z tego z tej technologii. Jak ktoś podchodzi do tematu czysto spekulacyjnie to uważam, że jest teraz na to dobry czas. Dlaczego? Niedawno przeszli na mainet. Ruski gas od Vitalika, też nie taki straszny, jak straszą nas w mediach głównego ścieku 🤮

### Sounds good? Dobra klikamy… 🤔

Na początek musisz wejść na [zk.money](https://zk.money/signup) połączyć portfel (np. Metamask) i stworzyć swój alias *(nick)*. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2WIEKnA3MGihB0EOc2p8B.png?height=993&width=1635)

Następnie podpisać kilka transakcji i go zarejestrować, po czym zdeponować minimum **0.01 ETH** w celu aktywacji konta.  
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MB-G30l7eZtNDojkifd3f.png?height=2151&width=3117)

**Włalaaaa - Done!** Masz już swój alias i interakcje z kontraktem. Wen drop? Za co drop? Trudno wyczuć… A więc czytaj dalej ziom, to zwiększy twoją szansę. 
  
 **UWAGA!** Zapisz swój alias bo gdy go utracisz -- **utracisz swoje środki**.  
 W zk.money **.v1** gdy nie pamiętaliśmy swojego aliasu można było wygenerować nowy. W **.v2** jest to niemożliwe! 
  
 Warto pójść o krok dalej i popatrzyć co protokół ma nam do zaoferowania. 
 **Zk.Money V1** oferowało nam jedynie przesyłanie ETH, DAI i renBTC pomiędzy walletami L2 & Mainet. Team postanowił pójść o krok dalej. Obecnie rozwijają private-defi, aby na warstwie drugiej poza zwykłym ‘anonimowym’ przesyłaniem wartości dostępne były swapy, stakinngi i inne bajery, które znamy z DEFI. Zaczeli z [LIDO](https://lido.fi/) (staking ETH dla ETH 2.0) - obecnie *4,38% APY*. Druga opcja, która już jest wdrożona to staking DAI w współpracy z [ElementFi](https://www.element.fi/) . Znaleść to możemy w zakładce [EARN](https://zk.money/earn). Warto to przeklikać i wrzucić coś ETH do LIDO czy trochę DAI do ElementFi na staking. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rS8YpDbaq0A3Kk8agtL7f.png?height=1188&width=2513)

## 👇 Kolejne protokoły soooon ser 👇

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i7DBEBz3n4o8U91Qs04DG.png?height=810&width=2494)

## Co jeszcze warto zrobić?

* Warto przerzucić assety z L2 na Mainet. Aby to zrobić przy wysyłce zamiast aliasu należy wkleić adres ETH *\[0x…\] 
 *
* Warto też przesłać asset po sieci L2. Aby to zrobić należy wkleić nie adres ETH, a alias odbiorcy. Możesz ‘posypać’ Popusiowi. Ahh, jak to słodko brzmi 😂 
 Anyway, jak podoba Ci się, to co robię i tak bardzo chcesz - mój login masz na screenach wyżej. Donate & spekulacja 2w1. Opcjonalnie możesz wysłać sobie na drugi wallet. I do tego zachęcam. Popek nie żebrak o_0  
 
* Jeśli interesuje Cię temat, warto dołączyć do nich na [Discord](https://discord.gg/DePA3Uvd) i się troszkę poudzielać. Może w przyszłości będą jakieś role? A może drop na podstawie napisanych znaków na ich discordzie tak jak to było chociażby na Lyra.Finance (optimism). Tak - tak było. Sam się na to załapałem i wpadło sympatycznie 😉

### UWAGA!

> Co do oficjalnej informacji o *#airdrop*.  Team nic takiego nie potwierdził.  
 Nie potwierdzili też tego, że kiedykolwiek powstanie token. Dodam, że większość potwierdzonych dropów wychodziła słabo. Zgodzisz się ze mną? 
 *“…Cicha woda brzegi rwie!”*

Na koniec jeszcze jedna uwaga. Jeśli obserwujesz mnie dłużej to pewnie o zk.money już wiesz i bawiłeś się tam już na v1. Jeśli tak to zaloguj się na [old.zk.money](https://old.zk.money/) i przenieś swoje assety na L1 po czym dokonaj ponownej migracji na L2 tworząc nowy alias. Tak mi doradzono na discordzie i tak zrobiłem. 

Temat będę obserwował dalej. Jeśli Cię to zainteresowało zapraszam do mnie na telegram i twitter aby być na bieżąco.

* [Twitter Popek1990.eth](https://twitter.com/popek1990crypto)
* [Telegram Popek1990.ETH \[Ogłoszenia\]](https://t.me/popek1990crypto)

```
Dyskusje w komentarzach na twitter ✌️
```

 
 Oczywiście to nie żadna porada inwestycyjna. A moje rozkminy o projekcie. 
 Technologia mi się podoba i na pewno będę obserwował & korzystał. 
 Uważam też, że projekty z tej gałęzi będą miały swoje 5 minut wraz z adopcją CBDC, które jest nieuniknione.  
  
 Bless you ✌️

title: Web3: Narratives of Disruption
body:
Instead of pursuing a false debate on whether this next-generation technology should be centralized or decentralized, we should ask how best can we arrange the narrative for desirable decentralization. This engaging narrative is constructed by making the mission and objectives among Web3 platforms more about coordination. In turn, this will create a space that allows individuals to maintain ownership and autonomy of the internet and its foundations. This is not some kind of freakish fiction but rather a reality of what is possible in today's Web3 repository. Through innovative technologies (NFT platforms, currency exchange, and wallet providers) in tandem with people-powered initiatives, Web3 is blossoming into a system of efficiently solving the problem found in centralized systems. Allowing self-sovereign identities their right for communication, privacy, and governance, but that doesn't come without its obstacles.

**Objective / Disclaimer**

Web3 is unfolding into new territories daily, building communities to find each other, holding themselves accountable towards the same mission and connecting with others. As a disclaimer to you reading this post, I am not an expert. I am naturally a researcher and enthusiast of the possibilities behind Web3 and decentralized narratives. I hope that by the time you finish reading this, you feel more familiar with Web3 and how decentralization plays a crucial role in facilitating the new narratives of what the internet was always meant to serve. I also strongly encourage everyone to always do as a motto states and "Do your own research" (DYOR) as a practice.

**Pre-requisite**

Let's start with Web1, which started around the early 90s, a version of the internet that was a space where consumers were primarily users on an open network of information (the read-only era). What Web1 had was many barriers to entry because of how technical the user experience was, which excluded the majority from using the internet. Leading us into the Web2 age, the centralization age came in with fewer barriers to entry due to big tech platforms such as Yahoo and Google who provided us with excellent user experience interfaces. This grew the consumer demand at scale. Most of us use this version today, where the primary focus is targeted advertisements and lack of privacy heralded by the arrival of social media. The Web2 internet we know today has needed the reliance on centralized intermediaries (Google, Meta, Amazon).

**Decentralization**

The main principle of Web3 is decentralization. Rather than being controlled by Big Tech, governments, financial institutions, or large corporations, it's entirely run by a community of individuals seeking to make a difference to combat our current Web2 form. This Web2 form has been governed by addictive, abrasive, and controlling narratives that I believe users are fed up with. Now, the technology underpinning Web3 makes it possible for far more inventive open-source and decentralized systems to be created — and enables decentralized economies (based on Blockchain systems that incentivize the stakeholders, developers, contributors, and consumers alike) to form around them. When this happens successfully will enable the products and services of Web3 to compete with and eventually surpass those of Web2.

**Opportunity**

Creatives now have an opportunity to leverage this technology and set it up to become a significant driver of economic growth. This can alter the workforce economy into new realms of possibility to significantly impact how we operate as a society (think about how DAOs, NFTs, and the Metaverse can help play this out?!). This is where I find the most utopic possibility in Web3, where the creator economy and the workforce collide. Bringing artists, lawyers, developers, and creators together from around the globe to create ideas and monetize them globally in permissionless crypto-economic systems— and essentially defining the future of work.

**Value Creation**

Ideas and community contributions of working toward a shared goal that gains value over time (through individuals who feed that value creation) are gaining momentum in various social communities (Friends with benefits, Forefront, and Party DAO). A concept that results in an ecosystem of equity that doesn't exclude the niche. The governing principle behind Web 3 takes us back to the idea we spoke about at the start of this post around Web1 which was the first version of open-source visions, so we are right back where we started. In a space filled with skeptics, naysayers, and the uninterested, my advice to you is to find where your area is in Web3 and begin to implement the change you want to see in the future. This isn't going anywhere, nor is it a hoax— It's the early stages of something completely new and has the potential to be shaped by the right set of values.

**Here a list of some fun places to start:** 

* <https://decentraland.org/>
* <https://rabbithole.gg/>
* <https://rally.io/>
* <https://mirror.xyz/>
* <https://dune.com/home>
* <https://www.radardao.xyz/>
* <https://chain.link/>
* <https://forefront.market/feed>
* <https://www.fwb.help/>
* <https://party.mirror.xyz/>
* <https://gitcoin.co/>
* <https://flamingodao.xyz/>
* <https://snapshot.org/#/>
* <https://rabbithole.gg/>

* Znając **alias *(login)*** drugiej osoby wysyłasz jej $ETH lub $Dai po L2 (sobie, delerowi, whatever). Koszt transakcji bardzo niski (L2). Dzięki technologi **zero-knowledge proof** druga strona otrzyma ETH, ale nadawca nie będzie znany.  
 Co ciekawsze ty jako wysyłający masz dostęp do potwierdzenia, że transakcja pochodzi od Ciebie (gdyby zaszła taka potrzeba to, to potwierdzisz).  
 **Nikt inny nie ma do tego dostępu bez twojego walletu!**  
 
* Gdy zamiast aliasu odbiorcy podasz adres ethereum środki zostaną wysłane na mainet. I ten przykład w moim przypadku ma utility w kwestiach spekulacji na multiwalletach. Wiesz sybil i te sprawy. Czaisz, prawda? Ahhh, jak ja dużo Ci mówię…🤫

## Dobra skończ pie\*\*\* Popku, przejdź do konkretów i mów co to, i po co mi to? 🤫

[Zk.Money](https://zk.money/) i sieć [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) działają już na mainecie. Ani jedno, ani drugie nie ma jeszcze tokena. Czy będzie ? Czas pokaże. Ja obserwuje i klikam bo jara mnie ta technologia. Uważam, że *Satoshi Nakamoto* byłby dumny z tego z tej technologii. Jak ktoś podchodzi do tematu czysto spekulacyjnie to uważam, że jest teraz na to dobry czas. Dlaczego? Niedawno przeszli na mainet. Ruski gas od Vitalika, też nie taki straszny, jak straszą nas w mediach głównego ścieku 🤮

### Sounds good? Dobra klikamy… 🤔

Na początek musisz wejść na [zk.money](https://zk.money/signup) połączyć portfel (np. Metamask) i stworzyć swój alias *(nick)*. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2WIEKnA3MGihB0EOc2p8B.png?height=993&width=1635)

Następnie podpisać kilka transakcji i go zarejestrować, po czym zdeponować minimum **0.01 ETH** w celu aktywacji konta.  
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MB-G30l7eZtNDojkifd3f.png?height=2151&width=3117)

**Włalaaaa - Done!** Masz już swój alias i interakcje z kontraktem. Wen drop? Za co drop? Trudno wyczuć… A więc czytaj dalej ziom, to zwiększy twoją szansę. 
  
 **UWAGA!** Zapisz swój alias bo gdy go utracisz -- **utracisz swoje środki**.  
 W zk.money **.v1** gdy nie pamiętaliśmy swojego aliasu można było wygenerować nowy. W **.v2** jest to niemożliwe! 
  
 Warto pójść o krok dalej i popatrzyć co protokół ma nam do zaoferowania. 
 **Zk.Money V1** oferowało nam jedynie przesyłanie ETH, DAI i renBTC pomiędzy walletami L2 & Mainet. Team postanowił pójść o krok dalej. Obecnie rozwijają private-defi, aby na warstwie drugiej poza zwykłym ‘anonimowym’ przesyłaniem wartości dostępne były swapy, stakinngi i inne bajery, które znamy z DEFI. Zaczeli z [LIDO](https://lido.fi/) (staking ETH dla ETH 2.0) - obecnie *4,38% APY*. Druga opcja, która już jest wdrożona to staking DAI w współpracy z [ElementFi](https://www.element.fi/) . Znaleść to możemy w zakładce [EARN](https://zk.money/earn). Warto to przeklikać i wrzucić coś ETH do LIDO czy trochę DAI do ElementFi na staking. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rS8YpDbaq0A3Kk8agtL7f.png?height=1188&width=2513)

## 👇 Kolejne protokoły soooon ser 👇

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i7DBEBz3n4o8U91Qs04DG.png?height=810&width=2494)

## Co jeszcze warto zrobić?

* Warto przerzucić assety z L2 na Mainet. Aby to zrobić przy wysyłce zamiast aliasu należy wkleić adres ETH *\[0x…\] 
 *
* Warto też przesłać asset po sieci L2. Aby to zrobić należy wkleić nie adres ETH, a alias odbiorcy. Możesz ‘posypać’ Popusiowi. Ahh, jak to słodko brzmi 😂 
 Anyway, jak podoba Ci się, to co robię i tak bardzo chcesz - mój login masz na screenach wyżej. Donate & spekulacja 2w1. Opcjonalnie możesz wysłać sobie na drugi wallet. I do tego zachęcam. Popek nie żebrak o_0  
 
* Jeśli interesuje Cię temat, warto dołączyć do nich na [Discord](https://discord.gg/DePA3Uvd) i się troszkę poudzielać. Może w przyszłości będą jakieś role? A może drop na podstawie napisanych znaków na ich discordzie tak jak to było chociażby na Lyra.Finance (optimism). Tak - tak było. Sam się na to załapałem i wpadło sympatycznie 😉

### UWAGA!

> Co do oficjalnej informacji o *#airdrop*.  Team nic takiego nie potwierdził.  
 Nie potwierdzili też tego, że kiedykolwiek powstanie token. Dodam, że większość potwierdzonych dropów wychodziła słabo. Zgodzisz się ze mną? 
 *“…Cicha woda brzegi rwie!”*

Na koniec jeszcze jedna uwaga. Jeśli obserwujesz mnie dłużej to pewnie o zk.money już wiesz i bawiłeś się tam już na v1. Jeśli tak to zaloguj się na [old.zk.money](https://old.zk.money/) i przenieś swoje assety na L1 po czym dokonaj ponownej migracji na L2 tworząc nowy alias. Tak mi doradzono na discordzie i tak zrobiłem. 

Temat będę obserwował dalej. Jeśli Cię to zainteresowało zapraszam do mnie na telegram i twitter aby być na bieżąco.

* [Twitter Popek1990.eth](https://twitter.com/popek1990crypto)
* [Telegram Popek1990.ETH \[Ogłoszenia\]](https://t.me/popek1990crypto)

```
Dyskusje w komentarzach na twitter ✌️
```

 
 Oczywiście to nie żadna porada inwestycyjna. A moje rozkminy o projekcie. 
 Technologia mi się podoba i na pewno będę obserwował & korzystał. 
 Uważam też, że projekty z tej gałęzi będą miały swoje 5 minut wraz z adopcją CBDC, które jest nieuniknione.  
  
 Bless you ✌️

Jeśli tak to zaloguj się na [old.zk.money](https://old.zk.money/) i przenieś swoje assety na L1 po czym dokonaj ponownej migracji na L2 tworząc nowy alias. Tak mi doradzono na discordzie i tak zrobiłem. 

Temat będę obserwował dalej. Jeśli Cię to zainteresowało zapraszam do mnie na telegram i twitter aby być na bieżąco.


 
 Oczywiście to nie żadna porada inwestycyjna. A moje rozkminy o projekcie. 
 Technologia mi się podoba i na pewno będę obserwował & korzystał. 
 Uważam też, że projekty z tej gałęzi będą miały swoje 5 minut wraz z adopcją CBDC, które jest nieuniknione.  
  
 Bless you ✌️

title: Zk.money - konkurencja na sterydach dla tornadocash z potencjałem na dropa?
body:
## Zk.money - Druga warstwa na ETH z naciskiem na prywatność użytkownika. 👁

> Privacy is Human right - yes ser?

Dziś Popuś napisał Ci kilka słów o technologii, która jest bliska moim poglądom.  
 Tak tak, *fuck-the-system , JP, HWDP na 100%*! Joke, ale tak należy rozumieć zk.money i stojące za tym zkSNARK bo coś w tym jest 😜

 
 Od razu napiszę, że nie mam się za znachora w tym temacie. Napiszę to co wiem ✌️Postaram się pisać językiem, abyś mnie zrozumiał/a.  
 Jest to też potencjalna spekulacja. Większość osób ma oczy skierowane w kierunku **#StarkNet**. A Popek obserwuję podobne protokoły, które mają mniejszy socialhype, a zarazem fajnie się rozwijają - no i tokena brak. Dlatego dziś będzie o zk.money, a nie o StarkNet.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2K-1MxaAX1hUd0dQuMUUs.png?height=607&width=1694)

## zk.money - warstwa 2 na ETH skupiona na prywatności 👀

**[zk.money](https://twitter.com/aztecnetwork)** to *dApps* do ochrony prywatności w warstwie 2 umożliwiający użytkownikom prywatne przesyłanie **$ETH, $DAI & $renBTC** ( renBTC *był w v1 ale v2 obecnie off - wróci imo*). Zk.Money jest zbudowane na silniku [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) (*Zk-Rollup na Eth)* w technologi zkSNARK . Aztec jest porównywalny do [zkSync](https://medium.com/@CalendarDefi/airdrop-guide-zksync-zigzag-a83ef3b33b70), ale koncentruje się na prywatności, której w zkSync brak. Więcej o ich wizji przeczytasz [tutaj](https://aztec.network/vision).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XME4s721Yez0zhziC8YLK.png?height=891&width=2545)

**Podam prosty przykład anonimowej wysyłki $ETH aby Ci to bardziej zobrazować:**

* **Deponujesz** *(shield) *$ETH **lub** $DAI z mainetu na **zk-money L2 
 **
* Znając **alias *(login)*** drugiej osoby wysyłasz jej $ETH lub $Dai po L2 (sobie, delerowi, whatever). Koszt transakcji bardzo niski (L2). Dzięki technologi **zero-knowledge proof** druga strona otrzyma ETH, ale nadawca nie będzie znany.  
 Co ciekawsze ty jako wysyłający masz dostęp do potwierdzenia, że transakcja pochodzi od Ciebie (gdyby zaszła taka potrzeba to, to potwierdzisz).  
 **Nikt inny nie ma do tego dostępu bez twojego walletu!**  
 
* Gdy zamiast aliasu odbiorcy podasz adres ethereum środki zostaną wysłane na mainet. I ten przykład w moim przypadku ma utility w kwestiach spekulacji na multiwalletach. Wiesz sybil i te sprawy. Czaisz, prawda? Ahhh, jak ja dużo Ci mówię…🤫

## Dobra skończ pie\*\*\* Popku, przejdź do konkretów i mów co to, i po co mi to? 🤫

[Zk.Money](https://zk.money/) i sieć [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) działają już na mainecie. Ani jedno, ani drugie nie ma jeszcze tokena. Czy będzie ? Czas pokaże. Ja obserwuje i klikam bo jara mnie ta technologia. Uważam, że *Satoshi Nakamoto* byłby dumny z tego z tej technologii. Jak ktoś podchodzi do tematu czysto spekulacyjnie to uważam, że jest teraz na to dobry czas. Dlaczego? Niedawno przeszli na mainet. Ruski gas od Vitalika, też nie taki straszny, jak straszą nas w mediach głównego ścieku 🤮

### Sounds good? Dobra klikamy… 🤔

Na początek musisz wejść na [zk.money](https://zk.money/signup) połączyć portfel (np. Metamask) i stworzyć swój alias *(nick)*. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2WIEKnA3MGihB0EOc2p8B.png?height=993&width=1635)

Następnie podpisać kilka transakcji i go zarejestrować, po czym zdeponować minimum **0.01 ETH** w celu aktywacji konta.  
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MB-G30l7eZtNDojkifd3f.png?height=2151&width=3117)

**Włalaaaa - Done!** Masz już swój alias i interakcje z kontraktem. Wen drop? Za co drop? Trudno wyczuć… A więc czytaj dalej ziom, to zwiększy twoją szansę. 
  
 **UWAGA!** Zapisz swój alias bo gdy go utracisz -- **utracisz swoje środki**.  
 W zk.money **.v1** gdy nie pamiętaliśmy swojego aliasu można było wygenerować nowy. W **.v2** jest to niemożliwe! 
  
 Warto pójść o krok dalej i popatrzyć co protokół ma nam do zaoferowania. 
 **Zk.Money V1** oferowało nam jedynie przesyłanie ETH, DAI i renBTC pomiędzy walletami L2 & Mainet. Team postanowił pójść o krok dalej. Obecnie rozwijają private-defi, aby na warstwie drugiej poza zwykłym ‘anonimowym’ przesyłaniem wartości dostępne były swapy, stakinngi i inne bajery, które znamy z DEFI. Zaczeli z [LIDO](https://lido.fi/) (staking ETH dla ETH 2.0) - obecnie *4,38% APY*. Druga opcja, która już jest wdrożona to staking DAI w współpracy z [ElementFi](https://www.element.fi/) . Znaleść to możemy w zakładce [EARN](https://zk.money/earn). Warto to przeklikać i wrzucić coś ETH do LIDO czy trochę DAI do ElementFi na staking. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rS8YpDbaq0A3Kk8agtL7f.png?height=1188&width=2513)

## 👇 Kolejne protokoły soooon ser 👇

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i7DBEBz3n4o8U91Qs04DG.png?height=810&width=2494)

## Co jeszcze warto zrobić?

* Warto przerzucić assety z L2 na Mainet. Aby to zrobić przy wysyłce zamiast aliasu należy wkleić adres ETH *\[0x…\] 
 *
* Warto też przesłać asset po sieci L2. Aby to zrobić należy wkleić nie adres ETH, a alias odbiorcy. Możesz ‘posypać’ Popusiowi. Ahh, jak to słodko brzmi 😂 
 Anyway, jak podoba Ci się, to co robię i tak bardzo chcesz - mój login masz na screenach wyżej. Donate & spekulacja 2w1. Opcjonalnie możesz wysłać sobie na drugi wallet. I do tego zachęcam. Popek nie żebrak o_0  
 
* Jeśli interesuje Cię temat, warto dołączyć do nich na [Discord](https://discord.gg/DePA3Uvd) i się troszkę poudzielać. Może w przyszłości będą jakieś role? A może drop na podstawie napisanych znaków na ich discordzie tak jak to było chociażby na Lyra.Finance (optimism). Tak - tak było. Sam się na to załapałem i wpadło sympatycznie 😉

### UWAGA!

> Co do oficjalnej informacji o *#airdrop*.  Team nic takiego nie potwierdził.  
 Nie potwierdzili też tego, że kiedykolwiek powstanie token. Dodam, że większość potwierdzonych dropów wychodziła słabo. Zgodzisz się ze mną? 
 *“…Cicha woda brzegi rwie!”*

Na koniec jeszcze jedna uwaga. Jeśli obserwujesz mnie dłużej to pewnie o zk.money już wiesz i bawiłeś się tam już na v1. Jeśli tak to zaloguj się na [old.zk.money](https://old.zk.money/) i przenieś swoje assety na L1 po czym dokonaj ponownej migracji na L2 tworząc nowy alias. Tak mi doradzono na discordzie i tak zrobiłem. 

Temat będę obserwował dalej. Jeśli Cię to zainteresowało zapraszam do mnie na telegram i twitter aby być na bieżąco.

* [Twitter Popek1990.eth](https://twitter.com/popek1990crypto)
* [Telegram Popek1990.ETH \[Ogłoszenia\]](https://t.me/popek1990crypto)

```
Dyskusje w komentarzach na twitter ✌️
```

 
 Oczywiście to nie żadna porada inwestycyjna. A moje rozkminy o projekcie. 
 Technologia mi się podoba i na pewno będę obserwował & korzystał. 
 Uważam też, że projekty z tej gałęzi będą miały swoje 5 minut wraz z adopcją CBDC, które jest nieuniknione.  
  
 Bless you ✌️

title: Deep Dive: Uniswap 2020 Airdrop Recipients
body:
Hello Frens, in this hit piece, I’ll be writing a deep dive on the recipients of the 2020 Uniswap Airdrop and what they’ve been up to in the crypto space.

## Airdrop Launch

A few weeks before uniswap announced the launch of $UNI token, Sushiswap was launched.

**TLDR:** Sushiswap forked Uniswap, launched $SUSHI token and liquidity mining.

Results:

[https://twitter.com/CamiRusso/status/1303866719417626625?s=20&t=4gg1SnKkzX7f4lyyQepguQ](https://twitter.com/CamiRusso/status/1303866719417626625?s=20&t=4gg1SnKkzX7f4lyyQepguQ)

On September 16, 2020, Uniswap announced the [launch](https://uniswap.org/blog/uni) of $UNI token and distributed 150 Million tokens to past users. Sushiswap also received a decent chunk from this airdrop.

[https://twitter.com/SushiSwap/status/1306493893492449281?s=20&t=4gg1SnKkzX7f4lyyQepguQ](https://twitter.com/SushiSwap/status/1306493893492449281?s=20&t=4gg1SnKkzX7f4lyyQepguQ)

Over the past two years though, Uniswap has undoubtedly been the winner with the largest DEX market share amongst the two and the Dex market in general. Innovation keeps winning!

## Section 1: Airdrop Recipients $UNI Holdings

[https://dune.com/embeds/1064174/1827931/16bce33c-b27d-478c-acef-e6a20ee5898b?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1064174/1827931/16bce33c-b27d-478c-acef-e6a20ee5898b?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1064174/1827935/cb95ab2c-bdee-4a49-919c-2f4d2e4c195c?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1064174/1827935/cb95ab2c-bdee-4a49-919c-2f4d2e4c195c?display=iframe)

As seen in the query above, \~220k addresses have claimed their $UNI tokens and they have claimed a total of \~136M $UNI tokens. At that time of writing, that $UNI is worth just over $1Billion. That begets the question, what’s the current balance of $UNI tokens held by the $UNI airdrop recipients?

[https://dune.com/embeds/1037563/1789711/974d8953-f73e-4b4b-81d0-69050943a0ae?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1037563/1789711/974d8953-f73e-4b4b-81d0-69050943a0ae?display=iframe)

As seen in the chart above, the balance of $UNI held by airdrop recipients has been declining since the airdrop to a current balance of 12.7M $UNI tokens. That is currently only \~8.5% of the $UNI tokens that was claimed. 

The highest balance (66.7M $UNI held by $UNI airdrop recipients was on September 27th 2020 (just over a week from when the airdrop was announced).

I thought it would be interesting to dig more into this data, so I created two Pie charts that divided the Airdrop recipients into the following profiles:

**Non $UNI Holder** - Addresses that no longer hold $UNI 
**Plankton** - Addresses that hold less than 10k $UNI 
**Shrimp** - Addresses that hold more than 10k $UNI 
**Fish** - Addresses that hold more than 100k $UNI

[https://dune.com/embeds/1041370/1796243/35ed3031-57b5-466f-b266-e577394ed940?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1041370/1796243/35ed3031-57b5-466f-b266-e577394ed940?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1041370/1796284/4d394f53-0792-4c28-ac06-fd56dac100d8?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1041370/1796284/4d394f53-0792-4c28-ac06-fd56dac100d8?display=iframe)

Similar to the balance of $UNI held by airdrop recipients, this pie chart is dominated by addresses that no longer hold $UNI tokens - 89.2%.

## Section 2: Top 100 Airdrop Recipients $UNI Holdings

Section 1 analysis would be incomplete if we didn’t look at what the top airdrop recipients were up to. In this [query](https://dune.com/queries/1037369) you can find the top 100 airdrop recipients and how much $UNI they received.

The top 100 addresses received 30M $UNI in total and currently hold a balance of \~3.12M $UNI tokens. The ratio of the amount they claimed and current balance is very similar to what we found for all airdrop recipients in Section 1.

[https://dune.com/embeds/1037407/1789661/5285a353-148c-4620-aa6a-2604a317a722?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1037407/1789661/5285a353-148c-4620-aa6a-2604a317a722?display=iframe)

I created charts of the daily outflows, inflows and netflows for the Top 100 Airdrop recipients and also all airdrop recipients.

If you want to dig deeper then you can find them [here](https://dune.com/Henrystats/uniswap-2020-airdop-recipients).

## Section 3: Airdrop Recipients Governance Participation

[https://dune.com/embeds/1053492/1812862/dbb4d3a3-e949-482a-8c94-c3aef88f2a90?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1053492/1812862/dbb4d3a3-e949-482a-8c94-c3aef88f2a90?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1053492/1812865/7e4389b5-7413-45f6-98e1-333bb1716979?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1053492/1812865/7e4389b5-7413-45f6-98e1-333bb1716979?display=iframe)

As seen in the counters above, airdrop recipients have delegated \~19.3M $UNI of the total 220M $UNI ever delegated.

The below charts show the total delegated uni vs airdrop recipients delegated uni over time and the number of uni delegators vs airdrop recipients delegators.

[https://dune.com/embeds/1053454/1812756/5b3e304c-473e-44fc-a70a-b4eae423938e?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1053454/1812756/5b3e304c-473e-44fc-a70a-b4eae423938e?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1053062/1812725/ccc9e1af-6634-44a3-b744-a5b8dabd267f?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1053062/1812725/ccc9e1af-6634-44a3-b744-a5b8dabd267f?display=iframe)

**N.B this doesn’t filter for addresses that do not hold $UNI anymore. I’ve created counters to get the number of delegators that still hold $UNI.**

[https://dune.com/embeds/1053963/1829103/cb487cb9-8e33-47e5-b1f3-2ce7be670d1f?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1053963/1829103/cb487cb9-8e33-47e5-b1f3-2ce7be670d1f?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1053995/1829108/d9fed0a9-0bd3-42c5-8f4d-cb9bf549f356?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1053995/1829108/d9fed0a9-0bd3-42c5-8f4d-cb9bf549f356?display=iframe)

## Section 4: Airdrop Recipients Protocol Usage

In this section, we’ll be looking at our airdrop recipients and their interaction with Uniswap. The first charts we’ll look at is a profile of airdrop recipients defined by the number of trades they’ve made on Uniswap.

**Here are the profiles:**

**Airdrop Seller** - Recipients that made only one transaction 
**Frequent trader** - Recipients that made more than one transaction 
**Active trader** - Recipients that made more than 100 transactions 
**Baby Dolphin Trader** - Recipients that made more than 1000 transactions 
**Dolphin Trader** - Recipients that made more than 10k transactions
**Whale Trader** - Recipients that made more than 100k transactions

[https://dune.com/embeds/1045343/1803079/245298e7-fd05-43d7-8707-f7d6d575d5cc?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1045343/1803079/245298e7-fd05-43d7-8707-f7d6d575d5cc?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1045343/1803181/14fcb2bd-f36d-43c1-80f2-62ed9811b1dc?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1045343/1803181/14fcb2bd-f36d-43c1-80f2-62ed9811b1dc?display=iframe)

As seen in the chart above, the airdrop recipients traded majorly on V2 with \~180k traders, compared to V3’s \~60k traders. There were also in total \~40k recipients that traded only once.

Pie Charts do more justice to this data, so here’s some:

[https://dune.com/embeds/1046113/1803419/4b825fc9-0b9c-4964-b162-913be22397e2?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1046113/1803419/4b825fc9-0b9c-4964-b162-913be22397e2?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1046113/1803427/478bccba-ec0b-4e06-b646-76fdbf2714a1?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1046113/1803427/478bccba-ec0b-4e06-b646-76fdbf2714a1?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1046113/1803574/cb878621-6852-4433-81bb-f1194e5d1272?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1046113/1803574/cb878621-6852-4433-81bb-f1194e5d1272?display=iframe)

Interesting to note that even though there were \~11m more transactions on V2 than there was on **V3**, the volume traded on **V3** was much higher with a difference of roughly **$100bn**.

There was in total **\~$244bn** traded on Uniswap by Airdrop Recipients. That is amazing!

### What were the most traded pairs?

In this [query](https://dune.com/queries/1046417) you’ll find the top 100 most traded pairs.

**WETH/USDC (V3)** was the largest traded pair with over **$100bn** in volume and a whooping **465k** trades.

From the query linked above, all top 10 most traded pairs had at least one of **WETH** or a Stablecoin (**USDC**, **DAI** & **USDT**).

### Total liquidity deposited on Uniswap?

Liquidity provision is very important to Uniswap Protocol, so it’s important to also look at the sum of assets deposited in liquidity pools by airdrop recipients.

[https://dune.com/embeds/1052639/1811756/3399333e-2032-4dbf-aad0-8735e34851e6?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1052639/1811756/3399333e-2032-4dbf-aad0-8735e34851e6?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1046816/1811718/66a503fc-ede6-4c76-b70d-715b9066d018?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1046816/1811718/66a503fc-ede6-4c76-b70d-715b9066d018?display=iframe)

**\~$247bn** was deposited by airdrop recipients, that is a lot! There’s also no surprise that the two most deposited assets were **WETH** & **USDC**. Both account for **\~$211bn** of the total value deposited.

## Section 5: Airdrop Recipients that Received Other Airdrops

In this section we look at some of the most popular airdrops in the Defi space since the launch of Uniswap’s airdrop and see which of the Uniswap airdrop recipients received these airdrops.

### ENS Airdrop

[Airdrop Info](https://cointelegraph.com/news/early-ethereum-name-service-ens-adopters-rewarded-with-a-hefty-five-figure-airdrop)
**Date: November, 8th, 2021.**

[https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828837/b23af0dd-f2e9-4521-94e0-c97116dc3012?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828837/b23af0dd-f2e9-4521-94e0-c97116dc3012?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828839/56a720b6-e5c6-40d2-8263-84c1b0ca79d4?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828839/56a720b6-e5c6-40d2-8263-84c1b0ca79d4?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828841/d3dc22d4-8407-433d-9d7b-fd6bfff583b6?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828841/d3dc22d4-8407-433d-9d7b-fd6bfff583b6?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828845/3172aed2-3a8e-44ed-a83e-cd60a19c974c?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828845/3172aed2-3a8e-44ed-a83e-cd60a19c974c?display=iframe)

[https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828851/fb1f9217-dd2d-48d1-a265-def9a6ae4b1e?display=iframe](https://dune.com/embeds/1064587/1828851/fb1f9217-dd2d-48d1-a265-def9a6ae4b1e?display=iframe)

Full dashboard [here](https://dune.com/Henrystats/uniswap-2020-airdop-recipients).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2K-1MxaAX1hUd0dQuMUUs.png?height=607&width=1694)

## zk.money - warstwa 2 na ETH skupiona na prywatności 👀

**[zk.money](https://twitter.com/aztecnetwork)** to *dApps* do ochrony prywatności w warstwie 2 umożliwiający użytkownikom prywatne przesyłanie **$ETH, $DAI & $renBTC** ( renBTC *był w v1 ale v2 obecnie off - wróci imo*). Zk.Money jest zbudowane na silniku [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) (*Zk-Rollup na Eth)* w technologi zkSNARK . Aztec jest porównywalny do [zkSync](https://medium.com/@CalendarDefi/airdrop-guide-zksync-zigzag-a83ef3b33b70), ale koncentruje się na prywatności, której w zkSync brak. Więcej o ich wizji przeczytasz [tutaj](https://aztec.network/vision).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XME4s721Yez0zhziC8YLK.png?height=891&width=2545)

**Podam prosty przykład anonimowej wysyłki $ETH aby Ci to bardziej zobrazować:**

* **Deponujesz** *(shield) *$ETH **lub** $DAI z mainetu na **zk-money L2 
 **
* Znając **alias *(login)*** drugiej osoby wysyłasz jej $ETH lub $Dai po L2 (sobie, delerowi, whatever). Koszt transakcji bardzo niski (L2). Dzięki technologi **zero-knowledge proof** druga strona otrzyma ETH, ale nadawca nie będzie znany.  
 Co ciekawsze ty jako wysyłający masz dostęp do potwierdzenia, że transakcja pochodzi od Ciebie (gdyby zaszła taka potrzeba to, to potwierdzisz).  
 **Nikt inny nie ma do tego dostępu bez twojego walletu!**  
 
* Gdy zamiast aliasu odbiorcy podasz adres ethereum środki zostaną wysłane na mainet. I ten przykład w moim przypadku ma utility w kwestiach spekulacji na multiwalletach. Wiesz sybil i te sprawy. Czaisz, prawda? Ahhh, jak ja dużo Ci mówię…🤫

## Dobra skończ pie\*\*\* Popku, przejdź do konkretów i mów co to, i po co mi to? 🤫

[Zk.Money](https://zk.money/) i sieć [Aztec](https://aztec.network/) działają już na mainecie. Ani jedno, ani drugie nie ma jeszcze tokena. Czy będzie ? Czas pokaże. Ja obserwuje i klikam bo jara mnie ta technologia. Uważam, że *Satoshi Nakamoto* byłby dumny z tego z tej technologii. Jak ktoś podchodzi do tematu czysto spekulacyjnie to uważam, że jest teraz na to dobry czas. Dlaczego? Niedawno przeszli na mainet. Ruski gas od Vitalika, też nie taki straszny, jak straszą nas w mediach głównego ścieku 🤮

### Sounds good? Dobra klikamy… 🤔

Na początek musisz wejść na [zk.money](https://zk.money/signup) połączyć portfel (np. Metamask) i stworzyć swój alias *(nick)*. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2WIEKnA3MGihB0EOc2p8B.png?height=993&width=1635)

Następnie podpisać kilka transakcji i go zarejestrować, po czym zdeponować minimum **0.01 ETH** w celu aktywacji konta.  
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MB-G30l7eZtNDojkifd3f.png?height=2151&width=3117)

**Włalaaaa - Done!** Masz już swój alias i interakcje z kontraktem. Wen drop? Za co drop? Trudno wyczuć… A więc czytaj dalej ziom, to zwiększy twoją szansę. 
  
 **UWAGA!** Zapisz swój alias bo gdy go utracisz -- **utracisz swoje środki**.  
 W zk.money **.v1** gdy nie pamiętaliśmy swojego aliasu można było wygenerować nowy. W **.v2** jest to niemożliwe! 
  
 Warto pójść o krok dalej i popatrzyć co protokół ma nam do zaoferowania. 
 **Zk.Money V1** oferowało nam jedynie przesyłanie ETH, DAI i renBTC pomiędzy walletami L2 & Mainet. Team postanowił pójść o krok dalej. Obecnie rozwijają private-defi, aby na warstwie drugiej poza zwykłym ‘anonimowym’ przesyłaniem wartości dostępne były swapy, stakinngi i inne bajery, które znamy z DEFI. Zaczeli z [LIDO](https://lido.fi/) (staking ETH dla ETH 2.0) - obecnie *4,38% APY*. Druga opcja, która już jest wdrożona to staking DAI w współpracy z [ElementFi](https://www.element.fi/) . Znaleść to możemy w zakładce [EARN](https://zk.money/earn). Warto to przeklikać i wrzucić coś ETH do LIDO czy trochę DAI do ElementFi na staking. 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rS8YpDbaq0A3Kk8agtL7f.png?height=1188&width=2513)

## 👇 Kolejne protokoły soooon ser 👇

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i7DBEBz3n4o8U91Qs04DG.png?height=810&width=2494)

## Co jeszcze warto zrobić?

* Warto przerzucić assety z L2 na Mainet. Aby to zrobić przy wysyłce zamiast aliasu należy wkleić adres ETH *\[0x…\] 
 *
* Warto też przesłać asset po sieci L2. Aby to zrobić należy wkleić nie adres ETH, a alias odbiorcy. Możesz ‘posypać’ Popusiowi. Ahh, jak to słodko brzmi 😂 
 Anyway, jak podoba Ci się, to co robię i tak bardzo chcesz - mój login masz na screenach wyżej. Donate & spekulacja 2w1. Opcjonalnie możesz wysłać sobie na drugi wallet. I do tego zachęcam. Popek nie żebrak o_0  
 
* Jeśli interesuje Cię temat, warto dołączyć do nich na [Discord](https://discord.gg/DePA3Uvd) i się troszkę poudzielać. Może w przyszłości będą jakieś role? A może drop na podstawie napisanych znaków na ich discordzie tak jak to było chociażby na Lyra.Finance (optimism). Tak - tak było. Sam się na to załapałem i wpadło sympatycznie 😉

### UWAGA!

> Co do oficjalnej informacji o *#airdrop*.  Team nic takiego nie potwierdził.  
 Nie potwierdzili też tego, że kiedykolwiek powstanie token. Dodam, że większość potwierdzonych dropów wychodziła słabo. Zgodzisz się ze mną? 
 *“…Cicha woda brzegi rwie!”*

Na koniec jeszcze jedna uwaga. Jeśli obserwujesz mnie dłużej to pewnie o zk.money już wiesz i bawiłeś się tam już na v1. Jeśli tak to zaloguj się na [old.zk.money](https://old.zk.money/) i przenieś swoje assety na L1 po czym dokonaj ponownej migracji na L2 tworząc nowy alias. Tak mi doradzono na discordzie i tak zrobiłem. 

Temat będę obserwował dalej. Jeśli Cię to zainteresowało zapraszam do mnie na telegram i twitter aby być na bieżąco.

* [Twitter Popek1990.eth](https://twitter.com/popek1990crypto)
* [Telegram Popek1990.ETH \[Ogłoszenia\]](https://t.me/popek1990crypto)

```
Dyskusje w komentarzach na twitter ✌️
```

 
 Oczywiście to nie żadna porada inwestycyjna. A moje rozkminy o projekcie. 
 Technologia mi się podoba i na pewno będę obserwował & korzystał. 
 Uważam też, że projekty z tej gałęzi będą miały swoje 5 minut wraz z adopcją CBDC, które jest nieuniknione.  
  
 Bless you ✌️

title: Reveel - Manifesto
body:
*Introducing [Reveel](https://www.r3vl.xyz/), the financial stack for Web3 collaboration.*

## The Future of Collaboration

The crypto movement, since its very beginning, has aimed to disrupt industries by shifting the balance of power back from intermediaries to end users.

As Web3 has emerged, artists, creative entrepreneurs, and builders - we’ll call them creators - have been drawn to this technology for that very reason. Indeed, this creative class has long been on the short end of the stick, subject to gatekeepers & centralized platforms that capture a vast portion of the value created by their art, their content, and their business.

Decentralization & ownership, the core principles of Web3, offer these creators new opportunities to develop, manage, and monetize their work & their communities.

These principles also offer new ways to collaborate. When ideas, talent, and resources are distributed, new and more fluid collectives surface to deliver on projects. Similarly, **when ownership is pushed to the edges of the network, to its users, collaboration becomes shared property. And shared interest becomes shared equity**.

But the blockchain is still a nascent technology and its adoption by creators still requires an advanced level of technical knowledge which greatly reduces accessibility to Web3. For the technology to facilitate collaboration & deliver on its promise to creators, many building blocks still need to be developed.

One of those building blocks is a financial stack that supports the shift towards this new way of working together and offers creators a fluid revenue sharing & revenue management solution. **A building block to unleash Web3 collaboration**.

## Reveel

We’ve started **[Reveel](https://www.r3vl.xyz/)** to create that building block.

At its core, Reveel strives to become a financial layer for collaboration in Web3 - **the financial stack for Web3 collaboration** - and a bedrock for creators to grow upon.

We understand that collaboration can generate friction: How do creators identify partnership opportunities? How and when do collaborators get paid? How do collectives define & monitor success?

We believe **transparency & equity** are the fundamental pillars that will enable products to solve these challenges & deliver on the promise to make collaboration simpler. This is why Reveel is building a platform that helps creators visualize and understand their on-chain income & automate the distribution of revenue amongst collaborators, rights holders, and partners.  
 In other words, Reveel is built for creators, artists, builders & brands that generate revenue on-chain and want to have more time to focus on what they do best: create.

With the support of our amazing backers, including [Binance Labs](https://labs.binance.com/) & [Moment Ventures](https://www.momentventures.com/), we’ve been able to bring together a rockstar team of seasoned Web3 developers, experienced venture builders & international touring artists, to deliver on our vision.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Y4Pwd71qYD9glaxusaxf5.png?height=994&width=1705)

## Announcing Reveel (v0.1)

Our team is excited to announce that we are rolling out the first iteration of the platform: **[Reveel v0.1](https://app.r3vl.xyz/)**.

Our initial beta includes a Revenue Share Protocol and a suite of Creator Analytics tools.

The **Revenue Share Protocol** allows creators to design & deploy their own Revenue Path (revenue share smart contract) in order to automatically split on-chain revenue with collaborators. The protocol has been implemented in a trustless, gas-efficient, and fully decentralized way. Funds can be sent to a Revenue Path and any listed recipient can withdraw their share of funds at any time, without the approval or action of any other collaborator on the smart contract, thus simplifying the revenue management aspect of collaboration.

The **Creator Analytics** offers the very first NFT analytics tool designed not just for collectors, but also for the creators themselves. Creators can track their entire catalog of NFT drops, compare their performance & draw valuable insights that guide their decision-making for future releases. Additionally, Creator Analytics allows users to track and understand their collector base, segment holders based on a variety of filters, and download collector lists. With this, Reveel allows creators to better understand how their revenue is generated and what projects & collaborations help them grow their community & their income.

As we launch Reveel, we’re fortunate to have outstanding partners, such as [Venice Music](https://www.venicemusic.co/), [Glass.xyz](https://glass.xyz/), [wavWRLD](https://wavwrld.com/), [BlackDave](https://blackdaveblackdave.com/), [Sammy Arriaga](https://sammynft.com/) and many more, who are pushing the boundaries of what it means to create & collaborate in Web3.

## Join Us

If you’re interested in learning more, would like to get involved, or have a need for what we’re building, we encourage you to [reach out](http://discord.gg/r3vl).

Our current version of the Revenue Share Protocol (v0.1) is in open beta and is totally free to use. You can access it [here](https://app.r3vl.xyz/).

Our suite of Creators Analytics (v0.1) is currently accessible by invitation only. You can apply for early access [here](https://airtable.com/embed/shrS1olVdquSRhfsO).

And finally if you want to stay up-to-date on our latest developments or simply want to follow our journey, you can **join our [Discord](http://discord.gg/r3vl)** and **follow us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/r3vl_xyz)**.

title: Link3 Alpha 1.0 介绍
body:
在一个所谓的高度互联的世界里，我们仍然发现很难与合适的人建立联系，或者真正信任我们与之联系的人。有些事情我们还没有弄清楚。

你到处都能看到它。在寻求新联系时，人们现在使用Twitter，Discord和LinkedIn DM。但是由于缺乏有效的身份门槛，人们通常最终根本没有连接，或者每天醒来都会被随机DM和垃圾邮件淹没在收件箱中。诈骗的盛行和缺乏背景进一步侵蚀了我们对屏幕背后任何人的善意，给我们留下了一种挥之不去的不信任感，扼杀了潜在的联系和合作。这在安全方面造成了可怕的后果：在美国，身份盗用和相关欺诈造成的损失从2019年的18亿美元增长到2020年的33亿美元和2021年的58亿美元（FTC，2022）。随着我们越来越多的生活转向数字化以应对全球大流行，这个问题仍在继续快速增长。

***我们在这里缺少一些基本的东西 -*** *网络缺乏一层承载信任并充满意义的身份。*

我们目前拥有的数字身份通常缺乏维度，并且大多数仅作为标识符存在，例如数字条目，存在于许多隔离的集中式平台上。用户没有简单的方法来验证特定标识的声明和属性，也没有网络在Web级别上实现可发现性和真正的连接性。

我们正在用区块链技术构建的去中心化的网络在减少有害的中介和促进个人点对点协作方面具有很大的前景。现在，我们正在超越金融用例，并释放去中心化社会的巨大潜力。但是，我们究竟如何解决身份信任和意义的问题呢？我们如何丰富交易记录之外的整体身份环境？


---

## Link3介绍

***Link3是一个可验证身份的Web3社交网络。***

**Link3配置文件聚合链上和链下数据，作为整体身份，实现用户和组织之间的可信网络和有意义的连接。**

*Link3帮助您通过可验证的连接建立信任，并通过上下文丰富身份含义。*在Web2中，我们通过关注人们，发布内容以及自我证明各种属性和偏好来维护我们的公共角色。除此之外，Link3还引入了一系列新的维度，讲述了一个关于你是谁的更真实和完整的故事：

* **您与**其他人和组织的联系，无论平台如何;
* **您拥有的**资产，代表您的地位和品味;
* 由第三方（如DAO和项目）颁发的关于您的主要成就和角色的**证书**;和所有其他**链上活动记录**，例如证明您参与社区的投票和捐赠。

**内在的信任层**将从上下文和意义的所有附加维度中增长，因为它们是可验证的。

像这样的**关系身份**是有机的和不断发展的，它由所有这些联系和记录组成，它是真实和值得信赖的，它具有丰富的上下文和意义，就像我们作为社会存在的方式一样，希望每个人都处于重要的关系中。


---

## 为什么需要Link3？

***对于用户来说***，现在Link3为您提供了一种**更好的方式来建立值得信赖和有意义的网络**。通过聚合到您的个人资料中的更多可验证的维度，现在您拥有了一个整体身份，可以更真实地说明您是谁，并让您以完整可信的方式展示自己。在您的个人资料上展示您的隶属关系，凭据，资产和所有其他记录，并开始探索网络。使用Link3链上配置文件立即了解并信任某人，而无需第三方参考检查的所有麻烦。

此外，随着上下文丰富的身份和更有意义的连接的建立，网络将具有**更好的可发现性。**期待更多人能够更好地了解您的优势，职业抱负，社区角色和个人品味。还要快速找到合适的人与之联系，并确保您的请求将在个人资料支持时得到充分传达。

列出一些简单的用例，其中包含一些将在不久的将来推出的功能：

* 以专门设计的名片格式共享您的个人资料，以快速展示您是谁以及为什么联系会很有价值。
* 使用您的个人资料提交申请，并保存填写表格和发送证据文件的所有冗余流程。
* 通过支付或资产来控制您的DM，邀请那些具有您真正重视的特征，背景和能力的人。
* 将您的投票委托给与您有意义的联系人，以及您对他们在社区中的身份有真正信任的人。

***对于组织和项目*，**Link3可能是您的多合一链接，可帮助您的关注者在一个地方发现有关您的一切。

Link3 组织配置文件经过**验证和信任**。为了保护用户免受Twitter和Discord上流行的诈骗和虚假链接的侵害，Link3通过其现有的官方帐户（如Twitter）验证组织。组织还可以与其他信誉良好的实体建立联系，并在支持者/合作伙伴/团队部分中展示它。颁发可验证的凭据或 SBT 稍后还将启用，以便组织识别关键的社区贡献者。由此类连接和记录组成的信任结构使 Link3 配置文件值得信赖。因此，用户将确保他们点击的链接和收到的所有更新都是官方的。

使用Link3的项目也可以**更好地与Web3社区连接**。用户使用钱包登录以关注项目，并且此类连接是基于地址的。项目可以构建Web3原生社区，并通过令牌门控事件，空投等解锁与他们互动的可能性。


---

## 建立在CyberConnect之上

Link3建立在**CyberConnect的分散式社交图谱协议**之上，并将回馈数据网络和兴趣图谱引擎。Link3以**分散**和**自我主权**的方式存储所有配置文件信息和连接。这些配置文件和连接与**区块链无关**，**可以移植**到任何平台，打破孤立的集中式平台的墙壁，使用户能够和项目完全控制其身份和连接。

在第一阶段专注于专业内容，Link3将最好地展示CyberConnect的社交图谱如何在连接更好的Web3中促进协作和引导网络效应。


---

## 加入

Link3目前处于Alpha 1.0阶段，只有列入白名单的地址或拥有邀请码的地址才能开始构建经过验证的个人资料。要在第一阶段进入白名单，您需要：1，由经过验证的Link3项目包含在其团队，支持者或贡献者部分中。（就像 link3.to/link3 的团队部分中包含的pisofa.eth[一样。](http://link3.to/link3.)如果一个项目还没有它的配置文件，你应该帮助让团队设置它！或者2，后面跟着一个超级KOL（[根据TwitterScan](https://twitterscan.com/view/trending/kol)）或 [ethleaderboard.xyz](http://ethleaderboard.xyz/) 的前100名用户。

要随时了解即将到来的NFT铸造和一系列白名单活动的最新信息，请加入我们[的Discord](https://discord.gg/EpYe82aFge)社区并在[Twitter](https://twitter.com/link3to)上关注Link3。

要了解有关Link3的更多信息，请访问 [http://Link3.to](http://link3.to/) 并[在此处](https://cyberconnect.typeform.com/to/zvkcmwYN)加入候补名单。请注意，ENS 用户可以将相同的句柄保留 2 周。

title: Web3: Narratives of Disruption
body:
Instead of pursuing a false debate on whether this next-generation technology should be centralized or decentralized, we should ask how best can we arrange the narrative for desirable decentralization. This engaging narrative is constructed by making the mission and objectives among Web3 platforms more about coordination. In turn, this will create a space that allows individuals to maintain ownership and autonomy of the internet and its foundations. This is not some kind of freakish fiction but rather a reality of what is possible in today's Web3 repository. Through innovative technologies (NFT platforms, currency exchange, and wallet providers) in tandem with people-powered initiatives, Web3 is blossoming into a system of efficiently solving the problem found in centralized systems. Allowing self-sovereign identities their right for communication, privacy, and governance, but that doesn't come without its obstacles.

**Objective / Disclaimer**

Web3 is unfolding into new territories daily, building communities to find each other, holding themselves accountable towards the same mission and connecting with others. As a disclaimer to you reading this post, I am not an expert. I am naturally a researcher and enthusiast of the possibilities behind Web3 and decentralized narratives. I hope that by the time you finish reading this, you feel more familiar with Web3 and how decentralization plays a crucial role in facilitating the new narratives of what the internet was always meant to serve. I also strongly encourage everyone to always do as a motto states and "Do your own research" (DYOR) as a practice.

**Pre-requisite**

Let's start with Web1, which started around the early 90s, a version of the internet that was a space where consumers were primarily users on an open network of information (the read-only era). What Web1 had was many barriers to entry because of how technical the user experience was, which excluded the majority from using the internet. Leading us into the Web2 age, the centralization age came in with fewer barriers to entry due to big tech platforms such as Yahoo and Google who provided us with excellent user experience interfaces. This grew the consumer demand at scale. Most of us use this version today, where the primary focus is targeted advertisements and lack of privacy heralded by the arrival of social media. The Web2 internet we know today has needed the reliance on centralized intermediaries (Google, Meta, Amazon).

**Decentralization**

The main principle of Web3 is decentralization. Rather than being controlled by Big Tech, governments, financial institutions, or large corporations, it's entirely run by a community of individuals seeking to make a difference to combat our current Web2 form. This Web2 form has been governed by addictive, abrasive, and controlling narratives that I believe users are fed up with. Now, the technology underpinning Web3 makes it possible for far more inventive open-source and decentralized systems to be created — and enables decentralized economies (based on Blockchain systems that incentivize the stakeholders, developers, contributors, and consumers alike) to form around them. When this happens successfully will enable the products and services of Web3 to compete with and eventually surpass those of Web2.

**Opportunity**

Creatives now have an opportunity to leverage this technology and set it up to become a significant driver of economic growth. This can alter the workforce economy into new realms of possibility to significantly impact how we operate as a society (think about how DAOs, NFTs, and the Metaverse can help play this out?!). This is where I find the most utopic possibility in Web3, where the creator economy and the workforce collide. Bringing artists, lawyers, developers, and creators together from around the globe to create ideas and monetize them globally in permissionless crypto-economic systems— and essentially defining the future of work.

**Value Creation**

Ideas and community contributions of working toward a shared goal that gains value over time (through individuals who feed that value creation) are gaining momentum in various social communities (Friends with benefits, Forefront, and Party DAO). A concept that results in an ecosystem of equity that doesn't exclude the niche. The governing principle behind Web 3 takes us back to the idea we spoke about at the start of this post around Web1 which was the first version of open-source visions, so we are right back where we started. In a space filled with skeptics, naysayers, and the uninterested, my advice to you is to find where your area is in Web3 and begin to implement the change you want to see in the future. This isn't going anywhere, nor is it a hoax— It's the early stages of something completely new and has the potential to be shaped by the right set of values.

**Here a list of some fun places to start:**

* <https://decentraland.org/>
* <https://rabbithole.gg/>
* <https://rally.io/>

title: 唯易报｜7.20快讯
body:
## 1. 消息人士：美国国会可能会拒绝仅让银行成为Stablecoin发行者的法案

7月19日消息，一位熟悉目前正在进行的美国立法工作的立法者称，国会可能会拒绝美国监管机构希望仅让银行成为Stablecoin发行者的法案。美国众议院金融服务委员会的Jim Himes（D-Conn.）表示，此举预计将为非银行机构成为官方批准的Stablecoin发行者提供途径，他是该委员会的高级成员，也是其小组委员会主席之一，但并未直接从事立法工作。一些立法者公开预测，有可能很快出台一项法案为Stablecoin制定规则。（CoinDesk）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Y_uvFn6_PtrUtQlg8t99v.png?height=506&width=900)

## 2. 灰度报告预测当前的加密熊市可能会再持续8个月

根据Grayscale的调查结果，加密货币投资者可能需要等待大约8个月才能迎来下一个牛市。全球最大的数字资产管理公司Grayscale Investments将目前的熊市与加密货币历史上的其他市场周期进行了比较，以预测下一个牛市何时可能到来。Grayscale指出，与传统市场一样，加密货币领域是有周期性的，该行业目前正经历着被分析师称为历史上 "最糟糕的熊市"。 

该报告估计，加密货币市场周期平均持续四年或大约1275天。该公司指出，比特币的实现价格，即所有购买价值的总和除以目前流通的BTC数量，可以有效地用于计算周期的时间线。 

灰度公司指出，比特币的实现价格在2022年6月13日低于市场价格，标志着熊市的开始。（Cryptopotato）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PxBBVwVwth9ALJnOvSF38.png?height=555&width=946)

## 关于我们

唯易WitEx.io是一家业务丰富的数字资产公司，主要包含交易所、资产管理以及挖矿三大业务，均与业内头部公司保持深度合作关系。

唯易WitEx.io是首家OKX Cloud合作交易平台，主要面向全球用户提供比特币、莱特币、以太币等数字资产的币币和衍生品交易服务。同时，WitEx.io共享OKX的账户安全体系、身份认证体系以及世界顶尖的撮合引擎和交易深度，独享世界最低的现货吃单手续费，为用户带来稳定、极致的交易体验。

title: Milady Poem
body:
There was a really bad month where Tomaszo stayed up late after his wife went to bed every night. He would listen to podcasts and play a skateboarding video game. He often used a cell phone application called Twitter to view and recommend to others a diverse array of ironic, cynical, sarcastically violent, earnestly violent, and/or politically extreme media that leveraged characters and stylistic themes/imagery from Japanese animation, low-resolution still shots and promotional material from outdated computer games, and assorted iconography, turns of phrase, and/or images appropriated from disparate internet communities of which he was sometimes a member and sometimes an outsider. But he also used the cell phone application to communicate his earnest thoughts and feelings so that people on the internet could console him in his paranoid schizophrenia or talk him down during bad episodes of autism.

He tweeted about how he felt this strange detachment and someone sent him a Twitter dm saying he was probably having a dissociative episode and that even though it happens to people sometimes, he shouldn’t tweet about it, because of how employers and family and whoever else can see his tweets and might do something that would make his life worse, like send him to a psychiatric hospital or prevent him from getting a different job. He thanked the person, deleted the tweet, and read most of the “dissociative disorder” article on Wikipedia.

He unpaused the skateboarding game. He dissociated some more. He had a hard time playing the game but liked having a word for what was happening. He paused the game. He looked at Twitter. He saw a brand entity icon account, @milady, post a joke about video games. Tomaszo replied to the @Milady account with a funny joke death threat. The @milady account was verified on Twitter. Tomaszo looked up how to be verified on Twitter. The verification process required a photo identification and filling out bureaucratic-seeming forms; it didn’t seem to make any sense for a brand to be verified on Twitter. Tomaszo deleted his death threat because he knew it was low-value, violent speech that wasn’t protectable under the First Amendment. Tomaszo then tweeted at the @milady account to ask if it had photo identification. The @milady account quote-tweeted Tomaszo’s tweet alongside a photo of a man being stabbed in the neck. The picture seemed real and was exceptionally graphic. There was blood and the beginnings of a gaping wound. The @milady account called Tomaszo a dumb piece of shit in the quote-tweet. Tomaszo liked the threatening and violent tweet out of a vague hope that it would defuse things. He unpaused his skateboarding game and worriedly played for seventeen minutes.

He paused the game and checked Twitter and saw that the @milady account’s quote-tweet had been deleted. The @milady account had tweeted an apology about being hacked. The apology had several thousand likes. Tomaszo received a dm from the @milady account. The @milady account called him a *little bitch.* The @milady account sent another dm calling him a *fucking narc*. The @milady account sent another dm with a picture of the man being stabbed in the neck. It looked like the same man from the first photo being stabbed for a second time. Tomaszo saw both neck wounds full of shiny blood. He saw that the @milady account was typing another dm.

He closed the Twitter application and put down his phone. He looked at the TV. He picked up his phone and opened the Twitter application. He saw that the @milady account had sent another dm. He looked at the message preview and thought, “this seems really bad,” and laughed uncomfortably, waking his wife.

title: The Philosophical Story of a Japanese Landlady
body:
When we were in Japan, we lived in the house of the eldest son of the landlord and shared a yard with the old landlord. When the two children were young, they watched the children for me, the old lady worked in the fields, and I often took the children to help. I deal with the elderly every day, and have established a very close relationship between day and night. I am fortunate to have learned important life lessons from the elderly while living happily.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/uNCYYhvelt3Jvq4eJHXTH.png?height=270&width=415)

Always fill the bowl and return it

The old landlord, the old man, broke down two years ago, and now he lives in a nursing home. The old lady is the only one left at home. Thinking that it is inconvenient for the old man to be alone, I have to give a bowl of delicious food to the old lady. The old lady always accepted it happily. Two days later, she came to the door and returned the bowl to thank it. The bowl was always full. Sometimes it's the blueberries she harvests, sometimes it's chocolate for the kids, sometimes it's two snacks, but she never returns an empty bowl. The old lady never talked about her philosophy of life, but she told me with her actions: it is not enough to accept the benefits of others, and it is not enough to say thanks with your mouth, you must return it in kind, even if it is a small thing that is not valuabl

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7laxPH1vEuvkw_r26bsE3.png?height=273&width=409)

e.

Today's affairs will never be postponed until tomorrow

Ever since I met the old lady landlord, I thought she was very busy. As many people come to her every day, there are as many things to do, so whenever something in the house breaks and needs to be repaired, I am embarrassed. But as long as I mustered up the courage to speak, the old lady immediately put down what she was doing, and immediately contacted me to fix it. No matter how troublesome, no matter how much it costs, the old lady never procrastinates. Maybe she knew that feeling distressed for the current little money, or putting the problem aside for a while, would only make things worse. Unpleasant things have to be resolved immediately, the longer the delay, the harder it is to do.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IMYRuL07jaMTvESzIWJJG.png?height=270&width=417)

Live and learnIn Japanese Shinto, the green leaves of the camellia family are used for decoration. The old couple planted a lot of these trees back then, and the leaves sold better than the flowers. Although this kind of business has long been discontinued, some shrines still like to ask for his family due to the good reputation they have accumulated in the past. The old lady took the call from the shrine and went to the mountain to chop branches, and then brought them back with a small truck to trim them in her garage. The old lady felt that it was a waste of time to do this work for several hours. So, she bought a CD that reads Japanese classical literature aloud and listened to it while pruning branches. Our whole family was shocked when the soft female voice echoed in the garage for the first time. The old lady who graduated from junior high school has been doing farm work all her life, and has been a big landowner for most of her life. She has a million-dollar family property. Nearly 80 years old, she is still doing farm work in the garage while listening to classical literature recitations. Continuing to learn will not make her richer, but it will make her more spiritual.

title: I am a little goldfish
body:
I am a little goldfish. If you really want to know how small it is, it may only be five centimeters with a ruler. I don't know where I came from, let alone what my mother looked like. For as long as I can remember, I have lived in a transparent glass tank with goldfish of various sizes and colors. The man who has passed the age of confusion sprinkles some fine powdery things into the fish tank every day. We all know that it is food. This is not because our noses are sensitive enough, but experience and habits tell us. We, in addition to eating, will never have any other surprises. At this moment, my companions and I opened our mouths and swam towards the food with lightning speed. Everyone has to go all out to try to eat more, because if we didn't eat today, we have to wait until tomorrow, which is too long for our stomachs. I don't know who spread the public opinion that goldfish can only be eaten once a day, and only a small amount, otherwise it will die. Alas, no communication is really scary. These grotesque antics always starve us, so we scrambled for less than 10 seconds. It is said that human beings cannot afford to hurt because of money, then our goldfish destroys harmony because of food.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/c6ATycOZw_E421crU1QH0.png?height=266&width=435)

We had a leisurely life, but we had no bigger places to go, and I often longed for vast freedoms. If possible, I would like to fight for freedom. The funny thing is that although we are weak, we cannot find a strong enemy.

Every day when I see pedestrians hurried by, I have such a show of self-comfort in my heart: Although I don't have the freedom of your human beings, I have free food to eat, don't worry about where to live. At this time, I can finally find a sense of superiority in being a goldfish. Of course, if anyone disdains my sense of superiority, it means that you haven't realized the difficulty of this accommodation. Go and watch the BBC documentary, after watching it, you will know how difficult it is to have a meal these days, and how difficult it is to have a nest.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wpiEjr1rfcAncfNIV5eaL.png?height=266&width=450)

I look happy every day, but I also have my own sadness. Every time I see my companions who have lived and played together leave, no one can see the sadness in my eyes, at least I know that humans are invisible, because they all leave with undisguised joy. But slowly I also accepted this separation, the old companion left, the new companion came, and so on. To be honest, when those goldfish were taken away one by one, in addition to being sad, I also flashed some despicable joy, but fortunately I ran fast and was not caught.

The days are just like this, when I eat comfortably and swim freely every day, it slips away quietly. One day when I was wandering around, I suddenly found that there were fewer and fewer goldfishes I was familiar with, and I realized that I had been in this fish tank for more than half a year. I suddenly wondered what life was going on for the goldfish that was taken away? And why did you stay here for so long? Is it a lucky escape every time, or are those people who don't want to take me away because I'm not pretty? I always thought it was the former. OMG! Am I not pretty? I never thought about this question. I immediately turned around a few times, and the surroundings were transparent, so I couldn't see myself. If it's really because I'm ugly that I've been kept here forever, then the joy of every escape before has become the biggest irony now.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9ylFc5S7PL5blZwZEFTGH.png?height=279&width=448)

When someone came to pick goldfish again, I swam hard and jumped up happily. Once I was finally lucky enough to be caught, only to be brushed down mercilessly, and I was embarrassed at the time. After being eliminated again and again, I realized that I am an ornamental goldfish. My value is that humans bring me home, and when they see me, they are pleasant to the eyes and in a good mood. I hate myself for not thinking about this before.

It seems that my appearance has no advantage, and I am trapped in a pile of fish. Everyone has their own characteristics. How can I leave this place and reflect my value? I realized I couldn't stay here for comfort anymore, because no one would ever appreciate me here. To think of new places to go, I have to put in more effort than any other goldfish.

To say that in the past, I was swimming lazily, but now I am swimming happily. I want to find my strengths, I don't have a good appearance, but I want to have a healthy body. Slowly I found myself with a new skill, and that is when I hold my head up and blow bubbles with my head up, my mouth can make a loud noise, I think the strings of bubbles are matched with This voice should make me look spirited and cute. This is something that other goldfish can't do, and I snickered. Waiting quietly for the arrival of the new owner.

But a few days later, I'm still here.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hqPccJ0VqSIi9NmPpW583.png?height=279&width=448)

At this moment, a mother and a five-year-old boy came to the fish tank. The mother lets her child choose their favorite goldfish. I looked at this little boy: white skin, smooth and full forehead, big eyes focused and focused, the yellow shirt and blue plaid shorts made him more beautiful and cute. I fell in love with him right away and swam to the front without hesitation. The little boy looked left and right, not knowing which one to choose. I knew it was time to give full play to my special talents. Sure enough, the little boy picked me up decisively after seeing my performance. Maybe he was too excited. When I was just picked up, his hand shook and I was thrown to the ground mercilessly. After I got out of the water and fell, I couldn't breathe like I had asthma, and I was dying on the ground. Fortunately, the little boy picked me up immediately and put me in the water bag that the man had already prepared. I took a deep breath, and I never thought the water tasted so good. At this time, the child's mother said: "No, I just fell to the ground, and I'm sure it won't last long. Let's pick another one!" The little boy said: No, I want this one, who said it wouldn't live long, look how well it swims! You can blow bubbles when you fall on the ground!

title: Missed finally put down
body:
I have to say that time is really the best span in this world, some promises, a vow, eventually lost to time, memories and then good can not withstand the years. Some people miss out on having to put down after all .......

In the past, there is always a person, once you are full of joy, but now it has become your closed mouth. The actual fact is that you can find a lot of people who have been in the business for a long time.

When I first said all kinds of promises and vows, I also believed that you are my small fortune. You also let me believe that there is still beauty in this world, but in the end you still left me, after all you and I became each other's life in the passing.

We missed it, I had fantasized about a long time; I had also fantasized about walking hand in hand with you on the road at dusk. The actual fact is that you are gone, leaving me with only memories. I thought you could come back by keeping the memories, but I was wrong, I, after all, did not wait for your turn, I finally know that missed is missed, can not come back. I also finally decided to put down ......

I finally made up my mind to return you to the sea of people! In fact, a long time ago in forcing themselves to slowly let go, every time I listen to your words of grandeur I almost believe that I and you will have later

body:
